analyzed: de'i phyir lhag pa nyid du shes pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “in the knowledge of excess.”

analyzed: don yod pa'i der 'du shes pa la dngos gzhi bstan @183a * //

analyzed: pa'o ; / der med pa la ltung ba nyes byas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “A wrong-doing downfall” is for one who perceives it as non-existent there.

original: de bas na 'du shes 'di la gtso cher byed pa po nyid do zhes bya ba 'di las shes pa po nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na 'du shes 'di la gtso cher byed pa po nyid do zhes bya ba 'di las shes pa po nyid do //

original: 'dir yid gnyis za na ni yid gnyis ni 'du shes dang 'dra'o zhes bya bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yid gnyis za na ni yid gnyis ni 'du shes dang 'dra'o zhes bya bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o //

original: tshig snga ma la ni rtsom pa lnga pa las so zhes bya ba ni tshig lnga pa'i chos rtsom pa la tshig lnga las lhag par ston pa na gzhan thams cad la drug pa las zhes bya ba'i don to //

translated: In the former statement, “from the five-worded,” it is from the five-worded composition of the Dharma, when one teaches more than five words, all the rest is the meaning of “from the six-worded.”

original: don lnga pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'dir mang po nyid do //
analyzed: don lnga pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'dir mang po nyid do //
translated: In the complete five-worded meaning, here there is the many-worded.

original: thams cad du drug pa la zhes bya ba'i 'di rnam par gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du drug pa la zhes bya ba'i 'di rnam par gzhag pa'o //
translated: Everywhere, this is the six-worded. This is the establishment.

original: mkhas pas gong nas gong du dris pa gtan la dbab pa byas pa dang / slob gnyer bsod pa dang / kha ton zhu pa dang / dmigs kyis dri ba dang / dus khrims dbog pa dang yon bshad pa dag ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mkhas pas gong nas gong du dris pa gtan la dbab pa byas pa dang /
analyzed: mkhas pas gong nas gong du dris pa gtan la dbab pa byas pa dang / slob gnyer bsod pa dang / kha ton zhu pa dang / dmigs kyis dri ba dang / dus khrims dbog pa dang yon bshad pa dag ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mkhas pas gong nas gong du dris pa gtan la dbab pa byas pa dang /
translated: The learned one does not do this by way of a learned one’s higher questioning, a learned one’s ascertainment, a learned one’s study, a learned one’s recitation, a learned one’s specific questioning, a learned one’s taking of a time limit, or a learned one’s explanation of the gift.

original: slob gnyer bsod pa dang / kha ton zhu ba dang / dmigs kyis dri ba dang / dus khrims dbog pa dang / yon bshad pa la brten pa la yang byed pa po nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: slob gnyer bsod pa dang / kha ton zhu ba dang / dmigs kyis dri ba dang / dus khrims dbog pa dang / yon bshad pa la brten pa la yang byed pa po nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: The doer is not one who does by way of a learned one’s higher questioning, a learned one’s ascertainment, a learned one’s study, a learned one’s recitation, a learned one’s specific questioning, a learned one’s taking of a time limit, or a learned one’s explanation of the gift.

original: de la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: de la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense for him in this.

original: 'dir rang dang nye ba'i gzhir gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dir rang dang nye ba'i gzhir gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Here, the meaning of “one’s own and those nearby” is the basis.

original: 'dir kha ton zhu ba smos pas klog pa yang bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir kha ton zhu ba smos pas klog pa yang bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Here, by mentioning recitation, reading is also included.

original: btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang dbyar tshul ma gnyis kyis klog pa'i phyir ci bklags lags sam zhes bya ba dang lhogs shig ces bya ba'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang dbyar tshul ma gnyis kyis klog pa'i phyir ci bklags lags sam zhes bya ba dang lhogs shig ces bya ba'i tshig gis so //
translated: The two queens, Mālikā and Varṣākārā, asked, “What have you read?” and “Please read this.”

original: dus khrims dbog pa dang yon bshad pa gnyis kyi gzhung ni zhu ba'i gzhung kha cig las yon bshad pa la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: dus khrims dbog pa dang yon bshad pa gnyis kyi gzhung ni zhu ba'i gzhung kha cig las yon bshad pa la ltung ba med do //
translated: Some texts on the topics of requesting the vows and explaining the benefits state that there is no offense in explaining the benefits.

original: bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dbog pa la ltung ba med do @183b zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dbog pa la ltung ba med do @183b zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: They state that there is no offense in bestowing the vows of one day vows endowed with eight branches.

original: gnas gzhan du ni snga ma ma byas pa nyid do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gnas gzhan du ni snga ma ma byas pa nyid do zhes bya ba la /
translated: In other places, the former is not done.

original: gnas gzhan du zhes bya ba ni khang bzangs la sogs par ston pa la snga ma gnas khang la sogs par byas pa dang lhan cig ma byas pa nyid de /
analyzed: gnas gzhan du zhes bya ba ni khang bzangs la sogs par ston pa la snga ma gnas khang la sogs par byas pa dang lhan cig ma byas pa nyid de /
translated: In other places means in a mansion and so on. The former is not done together with the latter, which is done in a house and so on.

original: de la ltung ba rnam par gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la ltung ba rnam par gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should not posit a downfall in that context.

original: ston pa'o / //
analyzed: ston pa'o / //
translated: This is the teaching.

original: / gang du 'don pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: / gang du 'don pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Where does one commit the downfall of reciting?

original: de'i phyir bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang cig car ram mjug thogs su ston byed du gyur pa'i chos dang yi ge yang 'don na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang cig car ram mjug thogs su ston byed du gyur pa'i chos dang yi ge yang 'don na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “simultaneously with one who is not fully ordained, or immediately after, one may recite the Dharma and the letters that serve as the means of teaching.”

original: 'dir gzhung ni lung las gsal bar gyur pa 'am ston byed du gyur pa nyid kyis mngon par 'don pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni lung las gsal bar gyur pa 'am ston byed du gyur pa nyid kyis mngon par 'don pa'o //
translated: Here, the text is recited by the clear statement or the means of teaching that appears in the scriptures.

original: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang cig car ram bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa las gnas kyi rgyu du gyur pa'i 'don pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang cig car ram bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa las gnas kyi rgyu du gyur pa'i 'don pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Simultaneously with one who is not fully ordained, or immediately after one who is not fully ordained, the recitation that serves as the basis for the cause of abiding is what is meant.

original: gnas ma yin pa la yang ston byed du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gnas ma yin pa la yang ston byed du 'gyur te /
translated: It may also serve as the means of teaching for one who is not in a proper state.

original: de 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi rig byed de de gsal ba'i don du chos zhes bya ba'i tshig smos pa yin no //
analyzed: de 'di lta ste dper na 'phong gi rig byed de de gsal ba'i don du chos zhes bya ba'i tshig smos pa yin no //
translated: For example, it is like the archery treatise. The word “Dharma” is used for the purpose of clarifying that.

original: ston byed du gyur pa las byung ba la mnyam par sbyor ba gzhan las yi ge ma yin par byas pa'i chos dang ldan pa don la chos su 'gyur te /
analyzed: ston byed du gyur pa las byung ba la mnyam par sbyor ba gzhan las yi ge ma yin par byas pa'i chos dang ldan pa don la chos su 'gyur te /
translated: From that which arises as the means of teaching, one who is engaged in equipoise may possess the Dharma that is not made into letters from another, and the meaning becomes the Dharma.

original: de bsal ba'i ston byed du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i tshig go //
analyzed: de bsal ba'i ston byed du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i tshig go //
translated: The word “revealer” is used to indicate the removal of that.

original: de ltar gnyis ka yang chos 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar gnyis ka yang chos 'jig pa'o //
translated: Thus, both are the destruction of the Dharma.

original: gang cung zad blo la nye bar son pa zhes bya ba 'di la btags pa'o //
analyzed: gang cung zad blo la nye bar son pa zhes bya ba 'di la btags pa'o //
translated: Whatever is slightly present in the mind is what is referred to here.

original: ston byed du gyur pa la yang 'di yongs su grub pa'i skyon du gyur pa ste gzhan la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ston byed du gyur pa la yang 'di yongs su grub pa'i skyon du gyur pa ste gzhan la ni ma yin no //
translated: And in the revealer, this is the fault of being fully accomplished, not in another.

original: ston byed du gyur pa'i don la yang ston byed du gyur pa gnas yin te der gyur pa'o //
analyzed: ston byed du gyur pa'i don la yang ston byed du gyur pa gnas yin te der gyur pa'o //
translated: And in the meaning of the revealer, the revealer is the basis, having become that.

original: de la gnas ni yang dag pa'i gnas te /
analyzed: de la gnas ni yang dag pa'i gnas te /
translated: There, the basis is the true basis.

original: de'i rgyu ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don ston pa'i phyir rab tu rgyas pa'i ngo bos tshig dang ngag gi rgyun gyis gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu ni brjod par 'dod pa'i don ston pa'i phyir rab tu rgyas pa'i ngo bos tshig dang ngag gi rgyun gyis gnas pa'o //
translated: Its cause is the basis by the continuity of words and speech with the nature of expansion, in order to reveal the meaning that is desired to be expressed.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i don 'don pa la ltung byed do //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i don 'don pa la ltung byed do //
translated: Falling away from reciting the meaning that has become like that is a downfall.

original: chos la zhes bya ba ni ming dang tshig gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am de'i nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o //
analyzed: chos la zhes bya ba ni ming dang tshig gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am de'i nyan thos kyis bshad pa'o //
translated: “Dharma” refers to what is spoken by the Buddha or explained by his hearers, having the nature of names and phrases.

original: yi ge yang zhes bya ba ni yig 'bru tsam yang ngo //
analyzed: yi ge yang zhes bya ba ni yig 'bru tsam yang ngo //
translated: The word “even” means “even a single letter.”

original: 'dir de las gzhan pa'i 'don pa la rtsom pa gcig pur 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ltung ba gcig pu nyid do //
analyzed: 'dir de las gzhan pa'i 'don pa la rtsom pa gcig pur 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ltung ba gcig pu nyid do //
translated: Here, it is a single offense because the recitation is a single composition.

original: de ltar yang tshig cig car brjod na ltung byed do //🔽tshig so sor brjod na ltung byed do //🔽cig car yi ge brjod na ltung byed do //
analyzed: de ltar yang tshig cig car brjod na ltung byed do // tshig so sor brjod na ltung byed do // cig car yi ge brjod na ltung byed do //
translated: Thus, if one recites the words all at once, there is an offense of wrong conduct.🔽If one recites the words individually, there is an offense of wrong conduct.🔽If one recites the letters all at once, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: mjug thogs su yi ge brjod na ltung byed do zhes bya ba lan cig brtsam par byas nas tshig cig @184a * //
analyzed: mjug thogs su yi ge brjod na ltung byed do zhes bya ba lan cig brtsam par byas nas tshig cig @184a * //
translated: If one recites the letters one after another, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: car dang / lhag pa'i tshig dang cig car yi ge dang / yi ge lhag par rjod par byed na ltung byed ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: car dang / lhag pa'i tshig dang cig car yi ge dang / yi ge lhag par rjod par byed na ltung byed ces bya ba'o //
translated: If one recites the words all at once, the words individually, the letters all at once, or the letters one after another, there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: de ltar bsdus nas ltung byed la gcig pa nyid gsungs so //
analyzed: de ltar bsdus nas ltung byed la gcig pa nyid gsungs so //
translated: Thus, having summarized, it is said that there is a single offense of wrong conduct.

original: ha cang thal ba la dmigs kyis bsal ba'i phyir mi 'dod bzhin du grub pa ni ma gtogs so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ha cang thal ba la dmigs kyis bsal ba'i phyir mi 'dod bzhin du grub pa ni ma gtogs so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In order to exclude the undesirable consequence, the text says, “except when it is unintentional.”

original: de ltar yang gzhung ni ldab ldib can dang smra myur ba la ltung ba med do zhes bya ba 'dis 'di bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang gzhung ni ldab ldib can dang smra myur ba la ltung ba med do zhes bya ba 'dis 'di bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Thus, this is included by the rule: “There is no offense for one who is stammering or speaking quickly.”

original: rjes su nyan du gzhug par bya ba 'don pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni ma gtogs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rjes su nyan du gzhug par bya ba 'don pa yang ngo zhes bya ba ni ma gtogs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “Also, one who is reciting what is to be listened to” is excluded.

original: rjes su nyan du gzhug par bya ba ni gang zhig cig car ram thog mar brjod par bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba de khrel dang bcas pa nyid do //
analyzed: rjes su nyan du gzhug par bya ba ni gang zhig cig car ram thog mar brjod par bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba de khrel dang bcas pa nyid do //
translated: “What is to be listened to” is that which is not to be spoken all at once or at the beginning. That is the one who has shame.

original: de ltar nges par sbyor ba la dogs pa dang bcas par cig car ram 'das par byas nas 'don pa la yang dag par gnas pa ste rgyud pa de lta bus ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar nges par sbyor ba la dogs pa dang bcas par cig car ram 'das par byas nas 'don pa la yang dag par gnas pa ste rgyud pa de lta bus ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, one who is engaged in that way, with doubt, speaks all at once or passes over, but does not remain in that way, with that kind of continuity.

original: kha ton zhu ba dang slob gnyer bsod pa dang / dmigs kyis 'dri ba yang ngo zhes bya ba yang ma gtogs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: kha ton zhu ba dang slob gnyer bsod pa dang / dmigs kyis 'dri ba yang ngo zhes bya ba yang ma gtogs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “Also, one who is reciting, one who is studying, one who is asking a question” is also excluded.

original: thog mar bzung te rang dgar 'don pa la rgyud pa 'di yang dag par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: thog mar bzung te rang dgar 'don pa la rgyud pa 'di yang dag par gnas pa'o //
translated: The lineage of this is well-established in the recitation of the first part, and in the recitation of the second part.

original: de la kha ton zhu ba zhes bya ba ni sngar ston pa mi brjed par bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de la kha ton zhu ba zhes bya ba ni sngar ston pa mi brjed par bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba'o //
translated: In this regard, recitation is the application for the sake of not forgetting the teaching previously.

original: slob gnyer bsod pa zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa la bzung ba yongs su rdzogs par zlos shing 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: slob gnyer bsod pa zhes bya ba ni sngar bstan pa la bzung ba yongs su rdzogs par zlos shing 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Learning is the repetition and explanation of the previously taught that is completed by retention.

original: dmigs kyis 'dri ba zhes bya ba ni phyogs 'ga' zhig dran par bya ba'i phyir ram the tshom bcad pa'i phyir kun nas 'dzin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs kyis 'dri ba zhes bya ba ni phyogs 'ga' zhig dran par bya ba'i phyir ram the tshom bcad pa'i phyir kun nas 'dzin par byed pa'o //
translated: Questioning is the retention for the sake of remembering some part or for the sake of resolving doubts.🔽The downfall is to be understood as before.

original: 'don pa'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: 'don pa'i ltung byed do /
translated: The recitation is the recitation of the scriptures.🔽 The recitation of the second part is the recitation of the Abhidharma.🔽 The lineage is the lineage of the recitation of the scriptures and the Abhidharma.🔽 The lineage of this is the lineage of the recitation of the scriptures and the Abhidharma that is well-established in the recitation of the first part and the recitation of the second part.🔽 The first part is the scriptures.🔽 The second part is the Abhidharma.🔽 The recitation of the first part is the recitation of the scriptures.🔽 The recitation of the second part is the recitation of the Abhidharma.

original: // / dge slong dang dge slong ma sdig can dag khyim du so sor go bar byed pa bsko bar bya'o //
analyzed: // / dge slong dang dge slong ma sdig can dag khyim du so sor go bar byed pa bsko bar bya'o //
translated: The lineage of this is the lineage of the recitation of the scriptures and the Abhidharma that is well-established in the recitation of the first part and the recitation of the second part.🔽 The first part is the scriptures.🔽 The second part is the Abhidharma.🔽 The recitation of the first part is the recitation of the scriptures.🔽 The recitation of the second part is the recitation of the Abhidharma.🔽 The lineage of this is the lineage of the recitation of the scriptures and the Abhidharma that is well-established in the recitation of the first part and the recitation of the second part.🔽 The first part is the scriptures.🔽 The second part is the Abhidharma.🔽 The recitation of the first part is the recitation of the scriptures.🔽 The recitation of the second part is the recitation of the Abhidharma.🔽 The lineage of this is the lineage of the recitation of the scriptures and the Ab

original: khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pas tshe dang ldan pa dag nyon cig khyim rnams su khyims sun 'byin par byed pa dang / gnas rnams su gnas sun 'byin par byed pa dag yod de /
analyzed: khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pas tshe dang ldan pa dag nyon cig khyim rnams su khyims sun 'byin par byed pa dang / gnas rnams su gnas sun 'byin par byed pa dag yod de /
translated: In each house they proclaim, “Venerables, listen! There are those who cause trouble in houses and trouble in monasteries.

original: 'di lta ste dper na 'bras s'a lu'i zhing phun sum tshogs pa la ser ba'i 'khor lo mi bzang pa bab na 'di ltar 'bras s'a lu de nyid shin te ma dang chud za ba dang tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang bu ram shing
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na 'bras s'a lu'i zhing phun sum tshogs pa la ser ba'i 'khor lo mi bzang pa bab na 'di ltar 'bras s'a lu de nyid shin te ma dang chud za ba dang tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang bu ram shing
translated: For example, when a good field of rice is struck by an unwholesome hailstorm, the rice is ruined, wasted, and spoiled.

original: gi zhing phun sum tshogs pa la nad kyi rigs dmar po zhes bya ba byung na 'di ltar bu ram shing de nyid shin te ma dang chud za ba dang tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur pa lta @184b bu dag yod kyi tshe dang ldan pa
analyzed: gi zhing phun sum tshogs pa la nad kyi rigs dmar po zhes bya ba byung na 'di ltar bu ram shing de nyid shin te ma dang chud za ba dang tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur pa lta @184b bu dag yod kyi tshe dang ldan pa
translated: Or, when a good field of sugarcane is struck by a disease called red rot, the sugarcane is ruined, wasted, and spoiled.

original: dag khyed cag dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'dis bstan pa'i tshod ma 'dzin cig /
analyzed: dag khyed cag dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'dis bstan pa'i tshod ma 'dzin cig /
translated: Venerables, do not take the measure of the teaching by this monk and this nun.

original: 'di ltar dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'di ni yos tshig pa bzhin du chos 'dul ba 'di la skyer mi rung ba'i chos can yin gyi bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan rnams la ltos shig ces smra bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar dge slong 'di dang dge slong ma 'di ni yos tshig pa bzhin du chos 'dul ba 'di la skyer mi rung ba'i chos can yin gyi bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan rnams la ltos shig ces smra bar bya'o //
translated: The monks and nuns should say, Just as a burnt-out rabbit horn is not suitable for growth in this Dharma-Vinaya, so too these monks and nuns are not suitable for growth in this Dharma-Vinaya. Look to the Blessed One and the elder monks!

original: mi spro na gsol bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni khyim du so sor go bar byed pa dang khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa mi spro na thams cad kyis dge slong dang dge slong ma 'di gnyis sdig can yin no zhes khyim du so sor
analyzed: mi spro na gsol bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni khyim du so sor go bar byed pa dang khyim rnams su so sor go bar byed pa mi spro na thams cad kyis dge slong dang dge slong ma 'di gnyis sdig can yin no zhes khyim du so sor
translated: If they do not wish to, they should request. Not wishing to inform in the houses and inform in the houses means that if they do not wish to inform in the houses, These two monks and nuns are sinful and so on, they should request for the sake of that.

original: go bar byed pa zhes bya ba de'i don du gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: go bar byed pa zhes bya ba de'i don du gsol bar bya'o //
translated: The meaning of inform in the houses is as follows.

original: shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid do //
analyzed: shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid do //
translated: The main consciousness means that it is the one who makes perception the most important.

original: 'du shes gang la zhe na /
analyzed: 'du shes gang la zhe na /
translated: What is the perception?

original: de'i phyir nyan pa po mi shes pa nyid dang bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa nyid dag dang ldan pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir nyan pa po mi shes pa nyid dang bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa nyid dag dang ldan pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, In relation to the listener who possesses ignorance and the status of not being fully ordained.

original: nyan pa po bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa nyid la pham pa dang dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gang yin pa de 'di las shes pa yin te /
analyzed: nyan pa po bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa nyid la pham pa dang dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba gang yin pa de 'di las shes pa yin te /
translated: The listener is not fully ordained, and the offense is either a defeating offense or a serious offense.

original: de la yang nyan pa pos mi shes pa nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de la yang nyan pa pos mi shes pa nyid la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the phrase “the listener does not understand” is that the listener is not fully ordained.

original: ci zhig rjes su bsgrubs na gnas ngan len brjod pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig rjes su bsgrubs na gnas ngan len brjod pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What is the offense of evasive speech?

original: de'i phyir smras na'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir smras na'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The text states, “If one says . . . ”

original: brjod par bya ba ci zhig smras pas she na /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba ci zhig smras pas she na /
translated: What is the subject matter that one should not speak about?

original: de'i phyir pham par 'gyur ba dang dge 'dun lhag ma dag so sor yang rung bsdus pa yang rung ngo zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir pham par 'gyur ba dang dge 'dun lhag ma dag so sor yang rung bsdus pa yang rung ngo zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The text states, “Either a defeating offense or a serious offense, either individually or collectively.”

original: don du ma nyid la tshig tha dad pa med do zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir bsdus pa de nyid la ltung ba gcig nyid yin te tshig gcig yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don du ma nyid la tshig tha dad pa med do zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir bsdus pa de nyid la ltung ba gcig nyid yin te tshig gcig yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The text states, “Because there is no difference in the words, even though there are many meanings.”

original: 'di lta ste dper na 'dis srog chags lnga bsad do zhes bya ba la don lnga po 'di rnams la gnas gcig tu cig car brdzun du smra bas brdzun du smra ba'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na 'dis srog chags lnga bsad do zhes bya ba la don lnga po 'di rnams la gnas gcig tu cig car brdzun du smra bas brdzun du smra ba'o //
translated: For example, it is like saying, “He killed five living beings,” where the five objects are all false speech spoken at the same time in one place.

original: 'di dag las gzhan pa'i kha na ma tho ba brjod pa ni 'di'i rjes su 'brang bas nyes byas yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag las gzhan pa'i kha na ma tho ba brjod pa ni 'di'i rjes su 'brang bas nyes byas yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the offenses that are other than these are misdeeds that follow from this.

original: brjod par byed pa ji lta bu la zhe na /
analyzed: brjod par byed pa ji lta bu la zhe na /
translated: What kind of expression is it?

original: de'i phyir bsko ba ma byas pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsko ba ma byas pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “without being appointed.”

original: brjod pa'i phyir gang la bsko ba ma byas pa de la'o //
analyzed: brjod pa'i phyir gang la bsko ba ma byas pa de la'o //
translated: It is because of the expression. It is for one who has not been appointed.

original: ci gnas skabs thams cad la'am zhe na /
analyzed: ci gnas skabs thams cad la'am zhe na /
translated: Is it in all circumstances?

original: de'i phyir dge 'dun la ma gsol ba la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dge 'dun la ma gsol ba la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “without asking the saṅgha.”

original: dge 'dun la brjod nas de'i phyir gsol ba la ni brjod nas de'i phyir gsol ba la ni brjod kyang ltung ba med do //
analyzed: dge 'dun la brjod nas de'i phyir gsol ba la ni brjod nas de'i phyir gsol ba la ni brjod kyang ltung ba med do //
translated: If one expresses it to the saṅgha, then it is without fault to express it after asking.

original: bden par smras pa la 'di zhes bya bar rig par bya ste /
analyzed: bden par smras pa la 'di zhes bya bar rig par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood that this is said in terms of speaking the truth.

original: brdzun du smra na ni ltung ba @185a * //
analyzed: brdzun du smra na ni ltung ba @185a * //
translated: If one lies, there is a downfall.

original: gzhan rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the other downfalls are established.

original: gnas ngan len pa brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gnas ngan len pa brjod pa'o //
translated: The expression of depravity.

original: smra ba'i pham par 'gyur ba la cho ga gang yin pa de nyid mi chos bla ma brjod pa'i ltung byed do //
analyzed: smra ba'i pham par 'gyur ba la cho ga gang yin pa de nyid mi chos bla ma brjod pa'i ltung byed do //
translated: The ritual for the offense of boasting about a non-existent quality is the same as for the offense of defeat of boasting.

original: de'i phyir de'i cho ga yod pa khas blangs nas bye brag smos pa ni bden pa nyid na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i cho ga yod pa khas blangs nas bye brag smos pa ni bden pa nyid na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, having accepted that its ritual exists, the Vibhajyavada school says, “It is true.”

original: 'du shes rnam par ma bzhag nas yod pa 'am med pa'i bla ma'i bdag nyid kyis mi'i chos kyi rigs pa nyid brjod na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'du shes rnam par ma bzhag nas yod pa 'am med pa'i bla ma'i bdag nyid kyis mi'i chos kyi rigs pa nyid brjod na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that if one expresses human qualities with the idea of existence or non-existence, without having established the idea.

original: gang zag ci 'dra ba la brjod na zhe na /
analyzed: gang zag ci 'dra ba la brjod na zhe na /
translated: If one expresses human qualities, what kind of person is it expressed to?

original: de'i phyir bden pa ma mthong ba bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bden pa ma mthong ba bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “To one who has not seen the truth, who is not fully ordained.”

original: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba kha cig las bden pa mthong ba lta ba phun sum tshogs pa la brjod na ni ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba kha cig las bden pa mthong ba lta ba phun sum tshogs pa la brjod na ni ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here, the text says that if one is fully endowed with the view of seeing the truth, then there is no offense.

original: 'phya ba yongs su bsal ba'i don du 'di btags pa'o //
analyzed: 'phya ba yongs su bsal ba'i don du 'di btags pa'o //
translated: This is stated for the purpose of completely eliminating criticism.

original: lta ba phun sum tshogs pa las glags yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lta ba phun sum tshogs pa las glags yod pa ma yin no //
translated: One is not vulnerable from being fully endowed with the view.

original: de bas na rigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par des nas bden pa mthong ba'i tshig byas so //
analyzed: de bas na rigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par des nas bden pa mthong ba'i tshig byas so //
translated: Therefore, having analyzed the nature of reasoning, the term “seeing the truth” is used.🔽One should not display miracles in front of householders.

original: khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba'i don nyid la ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni phran tshegs dag las rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba'i don nyid la ltung ba med do zhes bya ba ni phran tshegs dag las rtogs par bya'o //
translated: There is no offense for the purpose of taming. This should be understood from the Kṣudraka Collection.

original: dge slong mas ston pa'i spyan sngar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: dge slong mas ston pa'i spyan sngar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par mi bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: A nun should not display miracles in front of the Teacher.

original: rnam pa 'di gnyis ni phran tshegs las 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa 'di gnyis ni phran tshegs las 'byung ngo //
translated: These two types occur in the Kṣudraka Collection.

original: mi'i chos bla ma brjod pa'o //
analyzed: mi'i chos bla ma brjod pa'o //
translated: It is a human Dharma, not a Dharma of the gods.

original: gal te bstan pa nyid du dgos na gsol ba sngar btang ba'i don bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba byas nas sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te bstan pa nyid du dgos na gsol ba sngar btang ba'i don bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsol ba byas nas sbyin par bya'o //
translated: If the purpose is to inform, then the purpose of the earlier request should be fulfilled.

original: 'dis ni mi g-yo bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa de bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni mi g-yo bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa de bsdus pa yin no //
translated: This includes what was said: By this, one becomes immovable.

original: gang la skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang la skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: In regard to whom does the downfall of slander occur?

original: de'i phyir dad pa phul ba la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dad pa phul ba la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said: In regard to one who has offered faith.

original: 'dir gzhung ni yang dag par rung bar byas nas zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni yang dag par rung bar byas nas zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here, the text says: Having made it proper.

original: legs par rung bar byas nas zhes bya ba kha cig gis byas pa ste /
analyzed: legs par rung bar byas nas zhes bya ba kha cig gis byas pa ste /
translated: Having made it proper is done by some.

original: de ni nyams par yang dag par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ni nyams par yang dag par rig par bya'o //
translated: That should be understood as a downfall.

original: mi srid pa nyid kyi phyir bskyed pas byas pa'i grogs dang sa dag gis 'phags pa'i rdzas kyi phyir legs par rung ba nyid la skye ba nyid yan lag nyid du song nas gnas par byed ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi srid pa nyid kyi phyir bskyed pas byas pa'i grogs dang sa dag gis 'phags pa'i rdzas kyi phyir legs par rung ba nyid la skye ba nyid yan lag nyid du song nas gnas par byed ces bya ba'o //
translated: Because it is impossible, the properness is made to become a limb by the companions and the ground that are made by generation. It is said: One abides by making it arise.

original: 'dir 'di tsam gyi don nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir 'di tsam gyi don nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because this much is the meaning here.

original: rnam par 'byed pa las yang dag par rung bar bya ste zhes bya ba'i 'dod pa byin nas so //
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa las yang dag par rung bar bya ste zhes bya ba'i 'dod pa byin nas so //
translated: It should be analyzed in the Vinaya, having granted the wish.

original: ci zhig byas na skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung @185b byed du 'gyur zhe na /🔽de'i phyir dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi zas kyi rnyed pa ma yin pa dge slong gis gang zag la log par bsngos pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i don nyid gzhan la yang ming ma smos par brjod na yang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: ci zhig byas na skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung @185b byed du 'gyur zhe na / de'i phyir dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi zas kyi rnyed pa ma yin pa dge slong gis gang zag la log par bsngos pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i don nyid gzhan la yang ming ma smos par brjod na yang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: What is done to incur the downfall of slander?🔽Therefore, it is said: “If a monk, without mentioning the name of another, says that a gift of food belonging to the saṅgha of monks was misdirected to an individual, and that it is not a gift of food, then too it is a downfall.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i don nyid yod pa la zas kyi rnyed pa ma yin pa las gzhan dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa la dge slong gis gang zag la log par bsngos pa nyid kyis brjod pa la gzhan la yang ming ma smos pa
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i don nyid yod pa la zas kyi rnyed pa ma yin pa las gzhan dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa la dge slong gis gang zag la log par bsngos pa nyid kyis brjod pa la gzhan la yang ming ma smos pa
translated: ” The meaning of “not a gift of food” is that it is not a gift of food other than a gift of food belonging to the saṅgha of monks, and that it is a gift belonging to the saṅgha of monks that was misdirected to an individual by a monk.🔽The meaning of “without mentioning the name of another” is

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.🔽🔽

original: gang zag la zhes bya ba ni 'dir dge slong ngam khyim pa gzhan yang gang zag gi sgras bzung ba shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zag la zhes bya ba ni 'dir dge slong ngam khyim pa gzhan yang gang zag gi sgras bzung ba shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, person should be understood as referring to a monk or a layperson, or to any person.

original: bdag nyid gcig pu ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid gcig pu ma yin no //
translated: It is not just oneself.

original: 'dir gzhan brjod pa tshad ma gnyis kyis ma rnyed pa bdag nyid ma yin pa dang dge slong la sngo bar byed ces bya ba brdzun du smra bas gzhan la brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dir gzhan brjod pa tshad ma gnyis kyis ma rnyed pa bdag nyid ma yin pa dang dge slong la sngo bar byed ces bya ba brdzun du smra bas gzhan la brjod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Here, the expression another is found by the two means of valid cognition, because it is not oneself, and because it is expressed to another by false speech, I will dedicate to the monk.

original: bzung nas mi sbyin pa dag la yang mngon par brjod pa 'di ni shin tu sdig che bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bzung nas mi sbyin pa dag la yang mngon par brjod pa 'di ni shin tu sdig che bar shes par bya'o //
translated: And this expression should be understood as extremely sinful, even when not giving after promising.

original: 'dir kha cig ni bdag nyid la gang zag gis bsngo bar bya zhes bya ba'i mdo byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir kha cig ni bdag nyid la gang zag gis bsngo bar bya zhes bya ba'i mdo byed pa yin no //
translated: Here, some take the sūtra One should dedicate to oneself as authoritative.

original: 'di'i rnam par 'byed pa ni bdag nyid la gang zag gis bsngo bar bya zhes bya ba bdag nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba smos so zhes bya ba de ni mi rigs te ji ltar bshes ngor zhes bya ba 'di dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di'i rnam par 'byed pa ni bdag nyid la gang zag gis bsngo bar bya zhes bya ba bdag nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba smos so zhes bya ba de ni mi rigs te ji ltar bshes ngor zhes bya ba 'di dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The explanation of this passage is incorrect, because it contradicts the statement, “In what way is it dedicated to a person? It is dedicated to oneself.”

original: zhu ba las kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang 'di skad ces /
analyzed: zhu ba las kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang 'di skad ces /
translated: And in the Questions of Revata Sutra, the Lord said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis 'di ltar bshes ngor byas te dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bsngos pa gang zag la sngo bar byed do zhes zer na zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa bdag gis 'di ltar bshes ngor byas te dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa bsngos pa gang zag la sngo bar byed do zhes zer na zhes gsungs te /
translated: “If a monk says, ‘Venerable, I have dedicated to a person the gift of the Sangha, having dedicated it with partiality,’

original: dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos ba dag gis shes pa yin no //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi rnyed par bsngos ba dag gis shes pa yin no //
translated: he should be told, ‘You have dedicated the gift of the Sangha to a person.’

original: ji ltar bshes dor byas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sngo bar byed ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ji ltar bshes dor byas pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sngo bar byed ces gsungs so //
translated: The monks who have dedicated it with partiality should dedicate it again.’

original: yi ge gzhan las shes pa 'dir rtags ni bsngo bar bya zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge gzhan las shes pa 'dir rtags ni bsngo bar bya zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: In another text, the Lord said, ‘The sign of dedication is the statement, “I dedicate this.”’

original: ring du ma 'brel ba nyid dge slong gi dge 'dun las zas kyi rnyed pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: ring du ma 'brel ba nyid dge slong gi dge 'dun las zas kyi rnyed pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “Not from the Saṅgha of monks” means not from the Saṅgha of monks who are not related.🔽“From the Saṅgha” means from the Saṅgha of monks who are related.🔽“From the Saṅgha” means from the Saṅgha of monks who are related.

original: zas kyi yin par gyur pa'i dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa la dge slong rnams kyi yang dge 'dun gang yin pa ste /🔽gzhan rnams ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zas kyi yin par gyur pa'i dge 'dun gyis rnyed pa la dge slong rnams kyi yang dge 'dun gang yin pa ste / gzhan rnams ni ma yin no //
translated: “From the Saṅgha” means from the Saṅgha of monks who are related.

original: 'dir zas kyi rjes su 'brangs pas 'di la nyes byas su rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir zas kyi rjes su 'brangs pas 'di la nyes byas su rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Here, the offense is understood to be due to the food.

original: rnyed pa zhes bya ba la rnyed pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: rnyed pa zhes bya ba la rnyed pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: “Gain” is of two kinds:

original: gos kyi rnyed pa dang zang zing gi rnyed pa'o //
analyzed: gos kyi rnyed pa dang zang zing gi rnyed pa'o //
translated: gain of robes and gain of material things.

original: don 'di la ni gos kyi rnyed pa mngon @186a * //🔽par 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di 'dir zas ma yin pa'i tshig gi gzhung ste /
analyzed: don 'di la ni gos kyi rnyed pa mngon @186a * // par 'dod pa zhes bya ba 'di 'dir zas ma yin pa'i tshig gi gzhung ste /
translated: Here, the gain of robes is intended.🔽The text says “not food,”🔽but the text is incorrect.

original: 'dir gzhung ni log par bsngos pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni log par bsngos pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The correct text is “by misdirecting the offering.”

original: chos kyis ji ltar bshes dor ma byin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos kyis ji ltar bshes dor ma byin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “As the Dharma teaches” means “without giving.”

original: gzhan yang 'dir gnyis ka 'dod pa la sogs pa log pa'i rnam pa yod de /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dir gnyis ka 'dod pa la sogs pa log pa'i rnam pa yod de /
translated: Moreover, here there are two kinds of misdirection of offerings, etc.

original: de dmigs kyis bsal ba la nyes pa med pa'am /
analyzed: de dmigs kyis bsal ba la nyes pa med pa'am /
translated: There is no fault in that exception.🔽Or, it is not reasonable to disparage it.

original: na smad pa nyid ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba bye brag med par gsungs so //
analyzed: na smad pa nyid ni rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba bye brag med par gsungs so //
translated: Thus, it is stated without distinction.

original: ci zhig gis dmigs kyis bsal ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig gis dmigs kyis bsal ba yin zhe na /
translated: By what is it excepted?

original: de'i phyir dge slong gis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dge slong gis zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it says, “a monk.”🔽The sutra says, “Here, one who is very much inclined to disparage” and so on.

original: shin tu 'dir sngo bar byed ces bya ba mdo las mang po tshig gis re re bzhin du yang brjod pa la 'dir ltung ba yin te /
analyzed: shin tu 'dir sngo bar byed ces bya ba mdo las mang po tshig gis re re bzhin du yang brjod pa la 'dir ltung ba yin te /
translated: Here, it is a downfall if one disparages even one of the many words.

original: cig car mang po rnams brjod pa la ji tsam du skur pa gdab par bya ba'i ltung ba rnams de tsam yin no zhes bya ba 'dir gcig pa'i tshig gis 'dir bstan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: cig car mang po rnams brjod pa la ji tsam du skur pa gdab par bya ba'i ltung ba rnams de tsam yin no zhes bya ba 'dir gcig pa'i tshig gis 'dir bstan par rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, it should be understood that the word “one” indicates that the downfalls for disparaging are as many as the number of disparaged.

original: gzhan la yang zhes bya ba ni skur pa gdab par bya ba thob pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi nyan pa po gzhan la yang go bar byed na 'dir dngos gzhi ste /
analyzed: gzhan la yang zhes bya ba ni skur pa gdab par bya ba thob pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi nyan pa po gzhan la yang go bar byed na 'dir dngos gzhi ste /
translated: “Also, in regard to another” means that it is not only the attainment of disparagement, but also if one causes another listener to understand, then it is the actual basis here.

original: 'on kyang gang yang rung ba'i mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'on kyang gang yang rung ba'i mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is included in the class of human beings.

original: 'di la ster bar 'dod na brdzun du sma ba la dngos gzhi'o //
analyzed: 'di la ster bar 'dod na brdzun du sma ba la dngos gzhi'o //
translated: If one wishes to give, it is the actual basis of lying.

original: mi ster par 'dod na nyes byas so //
analyzed: mi ster par 'dod na nyes byas so //
translated: If one does not wish to give, it is a minor offense.

original: gnyis ka'i brdzun du mi sma ba la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i brdzun du mi sma ba la ltung ba med do //
translated: There is no offense for not lying to both.

original: log pa nyid du shes bzhin de ma yin pa la ster ba la ni nyes byas so zhes bya ba 'dir rnam par gzhag pa 'di rig par bya'o //
analyzed: log pa nyid du shes bzhin de ma yin pa la ster ba la ni nyes byas so zhes bya ba 'dir rnam par gzhag pa 'di rig par bya'o //
translated: If one knowingly gives to someone else, thinking it is someone else, it is a minor offense. This should be understood as the rule here.

original: ming ma smos par zhes bya ba ni ming ma yin par bzung ba nyid la yang 'dir dngos gzhi kho na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ming ma smos par zhes bya ba ni ming ma yin par bzung ba nyid la yang 'dir dngos gzhi kho na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Without mentioning the name means that even if one does not take the name, it is the actual basis here.

original: brjod na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: brjod na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyis so //
translated: If one expresses it, it is by dedicating it.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i don nyid ces bya ba 'di ni dngos gzhi'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i don nyid ces bya ba 'di ni dngos gzhi'o //
translated: The meaning of not being true is the actual basis here.

original: skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall of slander.

original: // / khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed smra bar 'dod nas 'dul ba dang ldan pa nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: // / khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed smra bar 'dod nas 'dul ba dang ldan pa nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The downfall of disparaging the scriptures is incurred when, wishing to disparage the scriptures, one says that the scriptures are not the Buddha’s words.

original: 'dul ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'i so sor thar pa'am /
analyzed: 'dul ba dang yang dag par ldan pa'i so sor thar pa'am /
translated: The scriptures are the pratimoksha, which is in perfect accord with the Vinaya,

original: de rnam par 'byed pa la sogs par gtogs pa la'o //🔽phran tshogs dang sil bu dang gleng gzhi rnams sam gzhi rnams la 'dul pa'i ma mo 'am /
analyzed: de rnam par 'byed pa la sogs par gtogs pa la'o // phran tshogs dang sil bu dang gleng gzhi rnams sam gzhi rnams la 'dul pa'i ma mo 'am /
translated: or the commentaries on it, such as the Vibhanga.🔽The Vinaya is the Ksudraka-vastu, the Durbina-vastu, the Nidana-vastu, or the Vastu, the Vinaya-mātṛkā, the Vinaya-vibhāṣā, the Vinaya-grantha, the Ekottara-grantha, or the Vinaya-mātṛkā-nirdeśa.

original: 'dul ba'i dka' 'grel lam 'dul ba drug pa 'am gcig las 'phros pa 'am 'dul ba ma mo la yang dag par gnas pa brjod pa gang yin pa la brnyas thabs @186b su gyur pa na khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dul ba'i dka' 'grel lam 'dul ba drug pa 'am gcig las 'phros pa 'am 'dul ba ma mo la yang dag par gnas pa brjod pa gang yin pa la brnyas thabs @186b su gyur pa na khyad du gsod pa'i ltung byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: To disparage these is to disparage the scriptures.

original: 'dir brnyas thabs kyi bye brag las ltung ba'i bye brag tu shes par bya'i 'don pa'i bye brag las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir brnyas thabs kyi bye brag las ltung ba'i bye brag tu shes par bya'i 'don pa'i bye brag las ni ma yin te /
translated: Here, the different downfalls are to be understood as resulting from different degrees of disparagement, not from different ways of disparaging the scriptures.

original: gcig tu 'don pa la dag rnams thams cad la ltung ba gcig nyid de gzhan la ni gzhan zhes bya ba cha shas dang rgyud dang sngags dang so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las pham pa'i chos bzhi 'don par gyur pa rnams la brjod par bya zhes
analyzed: gcig tu 'don pa la dag rnams thams cad la ltung ba gcig nyid de gzhan la ni gzhan zhes bya ba cha shas dang rgyud dang sngags dang so sor thar pa'i mdo 'don pa las pham pa'i chos bzhi 'don par gyur pa rnams la brjod par bya zhes
translated: If they recite the Pratimoksha Sutra together, then all the downfalls are the same, but if they recite it separately, then the four defeats are said to be different.

original: bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis 'dir so sor thar ba'i mdo las gsungs pa ni 'dul ba lhag ma rnams kyi dpe tsam du zad de /
analyzed: bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis 'dir so sor thar ba'i mdo las gsungs pa ni 'dul ba lhag ma rnams kyi dpe tsam du zad de /
translated: The words “and so on” indicate that the Pratimoksha Sutra is merely an example of the remaining Vinaya.

original: ji srid du dge slong gis 'dul ba dang ldan pa gang ji tsam brjod pa la brnyas thabs byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rnam par 'byed pa las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ji srid du dge slong gis 'dul ba dang ldan pa gang ji tsam brjod pa la brnyas thabs byed na thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rnam par 'byed pa las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: As long as a monk disparages any Vinaya, to whatever extent it is expressed, then in all cases he commits a downfall.

original: mdo sde las ni nyes byas zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba dang ldan pa las gzhan pa'i mdo sde mngon pa dang 'dul ba'i mdo dag gi rnam par 'byed pa nyid kyi phyir 'di las lhag pa med pa zhes bya ba 'dir rjes su 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: mdo sde las ni nyes byas zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba dang ldan pa las gzhan pa'i mdo sde mngon pa dang 'dul ba'i mdo dag gi rnam par 'byed pa nyid kyi phyir 'di las lhag pa med pa zhes bya ba 'dir rjes su 'gro ba'o //
translated: In the sutra, it says “offense” because it is a classification of the sutra, abhidharma, and vinaya sutras, other than those that are vinaya.

original: khyad du gsod pa'o /
analyzed: khyad du gsod pa'o /
translated: It is disrespect.

original: // / lag gi blas mchod rten dang dge 'dun gyi don du shing ljon par bcad par bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: // / lag gi blas mchod rten dang dge 'dun gyi don du shing ljon par bcad par bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “One should cut down a tree for the sake of a stupa or the saṅgha.”

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: de'i phyir de'i mdun rol du nyi ma bdun nam brgyad dag nas de'i drung du dkyil 'khor dang dri dang me tog dang mar me dang gtor ma sbyin pa dang rgyun chags gsum gdon pa dang sbyin pa bshad pa dag byas nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i mdun rol du nyi ma bdun nam brgyad dag nas de'i drung du dkyil 'khor dang dri dang me tog dang mar me dang gtor ma sbyin pa dang rgyun chags gsum gdon pa dang sbyin pa bshad pa dag byas nas /
translated: Therefore, prior to that, after seven or eight suns have risen, one should make a maṇḍala in front of that tree, and having offered incense, flowers, lamps, and bali offerings, one should recite the three continuous recitations and the explanation of the gifts.

original: lha gang dag shing ljon pa 'di la gnas pa de dag gnas gzhan tshol cig / shing ljon pa 'dis mchod rten nam dge 'dun gyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro zhes brjod nas smra ba pos shes par gyis shig ces so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: lha gang dag shing ljon pa 'di la gnas pa de dag gnas gzhan tshol cig / shing ljon pa 'dis mchod rten nam dge 'dun gyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro zhes brjod nas smra ba pos shes par gyis shig ces so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Having said this, the speaker should say, Understand!

original: de'i mdun rol du zhes bya ba ni gcod pa'i mdun rol du sbyin pa bshad par byas nas zhes bya ba ni thams cad de na gnas pa'i lha la brten par byas nas zhes bya ba don gyis shes par bya'o //🔽mchod rten nam zhes bya ba ni mchod rten gyi don nyid la mchod rten pa zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i mdun rol du zhes bya ba ni gcod pa'i mdun rol du sbyin pa bshad par byas nas zhes bya ba ni thams cad de na gnas pa'i lha la brten par byas nas zhes bya ba don gyis shes par bya'o // mchod rten nam zhes bya ba ni mchod rten gyi don nyid la mchod rten pa zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o //
translated: In front of it means in front of the cutting. Having explained the giving means having relied on all the gods who dwell there. This should be understood by the meaning.🔽 Stupa means that the word stupa should be expressed for the meaning of stupa.

original: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi don nyid la zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi don nyid la zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya'o //
translated: Sangha means that the word Sangha should be expressed for the meaning of Sangha.

original: gal te me 'byung ba'am khrag 'dzag pa 'am yal ga 'gul ba'am lo ma lhags pa la sogs pa rnam par 'gyur ba ston na /🔽des zhing la sbyin pa dang ser sna dag gi bsngags pa dad bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya'o @187a * //🔽zhes bya ba la /🔽zhing dang lhan cig tu sbyin pa ni nges zhing la sbyin pa'o //🔽zhing ni sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun gyi bdag nyid la bsngags pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te me 'byung ba'am khrag 'dzag pa 'am yal ga 'gul ba'am lo ma lhags pa la sogs pa rnam par 'gyur ba ston na / des zhing la sbyin pa dang ser sna dag gi bsngags pa dad bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya'o @187a * // zhes bya ba la / zhing dang lhan cig tu sbyin pa ni nges zhing la sbyin pa'o // zhing ni sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun gyi bdag nyid la bsngags pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: If the field shows a change, such as the appearance of fire, the flow of blood, the shaking of a branch, or the falling of a leaf,
