original: mtshams kyi phyi rol dang mi 'thob pa'i phyogs dang mdun ma yin pa na 'dug pa las lhag bor bya ba mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pa dang / mi 'thob pa'i phyogs na gnas pa dang / mdun ma yin pa na 'dug pa las zhes bya ba'i bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: mtshams kyi phyi rol dang mi 'thob pa'i phyogs dang mdun ma yin pa na 'dug pa las lhag bor bya ba mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni mtshams kyi phyi rol na gnas pa dang / mi 'thob pa'i phyogs na gnas pa dang / mdun ma yin pa na 'dug pa las zhes bya ba'i bsdu ba'o //
translated: “There is no remaining action outside the boundary, in an unattainable direction, or when sitting in front” means that there is no remaining action when one is outside the boundary, when one is in an unattainable direction, or when one is sitting in front.

original: gnyis dang ldan pa la gcig pa'i dngos po 'di rnams las lhag bor bya ba mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: gnyis dang ldan pa la gcig pa'i dngos po 'di rnams las lhag bor bya ba mi 'byung ste /
translated: In the case of two things, there is no more than one action.

original: mtshams gzhan na gnas pa na gang zhig la yang yan lag nyid do //
analyzed: mtshams gzhan na gnas pa na gang zhig la yang yan lag nyid do //
translated: For that which is located in another part is not a part.

original: de bas na phyi rol gyi mtshams la gnas pa dor ba'o //
analyzed: de bas na phyi rol gyi mtshams la gnas pa dor ba'o //
translated: Therefore, the location of the external part is rejected.

original: lhag bor zhes bya ba ni mthar thug par gyur pa'i bor ba ni dor ba ste lhag bor ro //
analyzed: lhag bor zhes bya ba ni mthar thug par gyur pa'i bor ba ni dor ba ste lhag bor ro //
translated: The word “more” means that the rejection of what is left over is the rejection of what is more.

original: de ltar yang 'dir gzhung ni rnam par 'byed pa las /
analyzed: de ltar yang 'dir gzhung ni rnam par 'byed pa las /
translated: Thus, the text of the Abhidharmakośa says,

original: lhag mar ma byas shing ma por yongs su ma btang @213a * //🔽ba ni lhag bor ma byas pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: lhag mar ma byas shing ma por yongs su ma btang @213a * // ba ni lhag bor ma byas pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “What is not done, not left over, not given up is not done.”🔽It does not occur in the case of an action that is not undertaken.

original: bya ba lag tu ma blangs pa la yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni lhag bor bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de lag tu ma blangs pa la yang lhag bor mi 'byung zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bya ba lag tu ma blangs pa la yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni lhag bor bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de lag tu ma blangs pa la yang lhag bor mi 'byung zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that what is left over does not occur in the case of an action that is not undertaken.

original: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong des lag pa gnyis bsnyal te byin len byas pa las zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong des lag pa gnyis bsnyal te byin len byas pa las zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here, the text says, “that monk should receive the alms by placing his two hands on the ground.”

original: nam mkha' la yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de ni mtshams kyi phyi rol zhes bya ba 'di'i khongs su gtogs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la yang mi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de ni mtshams kyi phyi rol zhes bya ba 'di'i khongs su gtogs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: “Nor in the sky” should be understood as included in the phrase “outside the boundary.”

original: rung ba ma yin pa dang de dang 'dre ba la ni mi bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni rung ba la mi rung ba 'dres pas lhag bor byi dngos po dor ba nyid kyis mi bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: rung ba ma yin pa dang de dang 'dre ba la ni mi bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba ni rung ba la mi rung ba 'dres pas lhag bor byi dngos po dor ba nyid kyis mi bya ba nyid do //
translated: “It is not to be done with what is improper or mixed with that” means that it is not to be done with what is mixed with the improper, because the substance is spoiled.

original: gang gi lhag bor du bya ba dang gang gi 'dir byed pa po nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi lhag bor du bya ba dang gang gi 'dir byed pa po nyid yin zhe na /
translated: With respect to what is to be done and what is to be done here, who is the agent?

original: de'i phyir gnas ma btang bas bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gnas ma btang bas bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, “It is to be done by not relinquishing the place.”

original: 'dir za ba'i gnas ni gnas shes par don gyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir za ba'i gnas ni gnas shes par don gyis shes par bya'o //
translated: Here, the place of eating should be understood as the place of knowledge.

original: ci chog par ma byas pa la yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci chog par ma byas pa la yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is it for one who has not prepared enough?

original: de'i phyir mi za bar brtag par byas kyang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi za bar brtag par byas kyang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “even though one has examined it, one should not eat it.”

original: ci ma gsol bas kyang bya'am zhe na /
analyzed: ci ma gsol bas kyang bya'am zhe na /
translated: If one asks, “Should one eat it even if one has not been invited?”

original: de'i phyir gsol bar bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gsol bar bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “one should eat it only if one has been invited.”

original: 'di'i bya ba ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di'i bya ba ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is the action here?

original: de'i phyir khyod kyir gyur gyi bzhud cig ces bya ba'i tshig gis bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir khyod kyir gyur gyi bzhud cig ces bya ba'i tshig gis bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said, “you should go to the place where you have been invited.”

original: kha cig ni ci bder gsol cig ces kyang bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: kha cig ni ci bder gsol cig ces kyang bya'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Some say, “one should eat it if one has been invited to eat it in any way.”

original: 'dod pa gzhan la 'di bstan pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa gzhan la 'di bstan pa'o //
translated: This is taught for others who have different desires.

original: gzhan dag gi tshig 'di 'dir bya ba nyid kyis shes kyang zer te /
analyzed: gzhan dag gi tshig 'di 'dir bya ba nyid kyis shes kyang zer te /
translated: Others say that the action here is understood by the words “you should go.”

original: 'dir don gtso che ba yin gyi tshig ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dir don gtso che ba yin gyi tshig ni ma yin no //
translated: Here, the meaning is primary, not the words.

original: de bas na 'di gnyis ka 'di'i bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'di gnyis ka 'di'i bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, both of these are the action here.

original: gzhan yang 'di lta bu'i rigs can kyi tshig ces bya ba rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di lta bu'i rigs can kyi tshig ces bya ba rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Moreover, one should understand that words of this type are of this kind.

original: ci tshig tsam kho nas lhag por bya ba zad dam zhe na /
analyzed: ci tshig tsam kho nas lhag por bya ba zad dam zhe na /
translated: If one asks, “Is the action of eating only by means of words?”

original: de'i phyir kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas so zhes bya ba smos te /🔽gang zhig gi yang ma zos pa la kun du rtog par bya ba'i lhag bor 'du byed pa des kyang kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas bya ba zhes smos pa ni bya ba btang bas ni bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas so zhes bya ba smos te / gang zhig gi yang ma zos pa la kun du rtog par bya ba'i lhag bor 'du byed pa des kyang kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas bya ba zhes smos pa ni bya ba btang bas ni bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Therefore, he says, “having eaten two or three mouthfuls, one should stop.”🔽One should stop after eating two or three mouthfuls, even if one has not yet imagined that one is full.🔽The phrase “having eaten” indicates that one should not eat after giving up one’s activity.

original: ma zos pa la kun du rtog pa byed bzhin pa la yang gang zag brjod pa gang yin pa de la des ni bza' bar mi bya bar khyod kyir gyur gyi bzhud cig ces bya ba'i tshig tsam nyid du bya ba 'dis bstan par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ma zos pa la kun du rtog pa byed bzhin pa la yang gang zag brjod pa gang yin pa de la des ni bza' bar mi bya bar khyod kyir gyur gyi bzhud cig ces bya ba'i tshig tsam nyid du bya ba 'dis bstan par shes par bya'o //
translated: The phrase “you should go” indicates that one should not eat while imagining that one is not full.

original: lhag bor byas pa gzhan gyis bza' bar @213b bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong gcig la rung ba gang yin pa de gzhan la yang rung ngo zhes bya ba de la 'di bstan pa'o //
analyzed: lhag bor byas pa gzhan gyis bza' bar @213b bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge slong gcig la rung ba gang yin pa de gzhan la yang rung ngo zhes bya ba de la 'di bstan pa'o //
translated: The phrase “another should eat what remains” indicates that what is suitable for one monk is also suitable for another.

original: shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid do //
analyzed: shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid do //
translated: “The one who is foremost in understanding” is the one who is foremost in perception.

original: gang la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin zhe na /
translated: What is the agent of the predominant notion?

original: de'i phyir spangs pa nyid dang lhag bor ma byas pa nyid dag la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir spangs pa nyid dang lhag bor ma byas pa nyid dag la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, he says: in regard to the abandonment and the non-performance of what is predominant.

original: lhag bor ma byas pa nyid gang yin pa de la de ni lhag bor nyid du ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: lhag bor ma byas pa nyid gang yin pa de la de ni lhag bor nyid du ma byas pa'o //
translated: That which is predominant is not performed in regard to what is not performed.

original: zos nas spangs pa nyid la yang lhag bor du bya ba ma byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zos nas spangs pa nyid la yang lhag bor du bya ba ma byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: in regard to the abandonment after eating, the performance of what is predominant is not performed.

original: ci zhig rjes su bsgrub na byed pa po nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig rjes su bsgrub na byed pa po nyid yin zhe na /
translated: What is the agent of the subsequent performance?

original: de'i phyir zos na'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zos na'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, he says: when one has eaten.

original: ci zhig zos na zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig zos na zhe na /

original: de'i phyir zas tsam mo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir zas tsam mo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, he says: just the food.

original: bca' bar bya ba tsam yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bca' bar bya ba tsam yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: just the food that is to be chewed.

original: 'di stan gcig pa'i zas dang por byas pas de'i phyir de dag thams cad ni rnam par nges pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di stan gcig pa'i zas dang por byas pas de'i phyir de dag thams cad ni rnam par nges pa ma yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since the first food is made into the one meal, therefore all of these should be understood as indeterminate.

original: sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs pa spangs pa nyid yin yang rung spangs pa nyid ma yin yang rung ste /
analyzed: sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs pa spangs pa nyid yin yang rung spangs pa nyid ma yin yang rung ste /
translated: Whether or not one has taken up the virtues of purification, whether or not one has abandoned them,

original: lhag bor byas kyang rung lhag bor ma byas kyang rung bca' bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba dag zos bzhin pas bza' bar mi bya zhes bya ba 'di'i bye brag rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag bor byas kyang rung lhag bor ma byas kyang rung bca' bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba dag zos bzhin pas bza' bar mi bya zhes bya ba 'di'i bye brag rtogs par bya'o //
translated: whether or not one has made a special effort, one should not eat while eating what is to be eaten and what is to be chewed. This is the distinction.

original: stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed do /
analyzed: stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall of eating on one seat.

original: // /'di yang shes gtso'o //
analyzed: // /'di yang shes gtso'o //
translated: This is also known as the downfall of eating on one seat.

original: spangs pa nyid dang lhag bor ma byas pa nyid dag la'o zhes sngar bstan pa'i yan lag de dag khas blangs nas bsgrub pa gang yin la 'du shes pa 'di'i byed pa po nyid yin zhes bya ba 'di la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /🔽stobs na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: spangs pa nyid dang lhag bor ma byas pa nyid dag la'o zhes sngar bstan pa'i yan lag de dag khas blangs nas bsgrub pa gang yin la 'du shes pa 'di'i byed pa po nyid yin zhes bya ba 'di la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste / stobs na'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The downfall is incurred by the one who has accepted the previously mentioned factors of abandoning and not making a special effort, and who is the agent of this perception.

original: zas tsam zos pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zas tsam zos pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The downfall is incurred when one has eaten even just a little food.

original: gang la stobs na zhe na de'i phyir dge slong la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gang la stobs na zhe na de'i phyir dge slong la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: If it is asked, “To whom is it given?” it is said, “To a monk.”

original: thams cad du rung ba ma yin pa'i phyir stobs pa la nyes pa zhes bya ba 'di'i rjes su 'brangs nas rig par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad du rung ba ma yin pa'i phyir stobs pa la nyes pa zhes bya ba 'di'i rjes su 'brangs nas rig par bya'o //
translated: Because it is not suitable for everyone, it should be understood that the fault of giving is in accordance with this statement.

original: spangs pa la stobs pa'i ltung byed do /🔽// / shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid do //
analyzed: spangs pa la stobs pa'i ltung byed do / // / shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid do //
translated: There is an offense of wrong conduct for giving to one who has abandoned.🔽The main idea is the one who makes perception the most important.

original: gang la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin zhe na /🔽de'i phyir so sor nges pa'i zas kyi gnas can dag las gzhan pa'i dge slong dge 'dun du gyur pa mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa dag zan lhan cig ma yin pa nyid la'o zhes bya ba smos te /🔽gnas khang na zas tha dad pa nyid du nges pa de ni so sor nges pa'i zas so //

translated: If it is asked, “To whom is perception the most important?”

original: de rnams las gzhan dge slong mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa'i bzhi la sogs pa dge 'dun du gyur pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig ma yin pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de rnams las gzhan dge slong mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa'i bzhi la sogs pa dge 'dun du gyur pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig ma yin pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not together with the monks who are part of the saṅgha, such as the four who are dwelling within the boundary.

original: 'dir gzhung ni tshogs shing za ba bzung ba ni dge 'dun du gyur pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni tshogs shing za ba bzung ba ni dge 'dun du gyur pa rnams kyis zhes bya ba rig par bya'o //
translated: Here the text should be understood as “The acceptance of eating in a group is by those who are part of the saṅgha.”

original: 'dir rnam par 'byed pa las la g-yeng ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dir rnam par 'byed pa las la g-yeng ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Here the analysis states, “Distraction is called.”

original: tshogs shing za ba ni tshogs nas za ba'o //
analyzed: tshogs shing za ba ni tshogs nas za ba'o //
translated: Eating in a group is eating together.🔽The meaning of “distraction” is “dividing the saṅgha.”

original: g-yeng ba nyid ces pa ni dge 'dun gnyis 'byed pa'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: g-yeng ba nyid ces pa ni dge 'dun gnyis 'byed pa'o zhes bya ba 'di'i don rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: Here the meaning is established as this.

original: ci gcig pu zhig zan lhan cig ma yin pa nyid la yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci gcig pu zhig zan lhan cig ma yin pa nyid la yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is it only when one is not together with others that one eats?

original: de'i phyir lhan cig pa'i 'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir lhan cig pa'i 'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, “Together” means

original: rnam pa gang dang lhan cig pa'i zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa gang dang lhan cig pa'i zhe na /
translated: with what kind?

original: de'i phyir cig car za ba dang ngo zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir cig car za ba dang ngo zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore it says, “eating at the same time.”

original: su dang lhan cig pa'i zhe na /
analyzed: su dang lhan cig pa'i zhe na /
translated: With whom?

original: de'i phyir gsum po la sogs pa dang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsum po la sogs pa dang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore he says, “with three or more.”

original: gsum pa 'am bzhi la sogs pa'i tshogs dang ngo //
analyzed: gsum pa 'am bzhi la sogs pa'i tshogs dang ngo //
translated: With a group of three or more.

original: 'dir gzhung ni bzhi po dag las gcig gis zhal ta byed cing gsum za ba la ni ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni bzhi po dag las gcig gis zhal ta byed cing gsum za ba la ni ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here the text says, “There is no offense if one eats with three or more, including one who is not fully ordained.”

original: gang gi gsum po la sogs pa dang zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi gsum po la sogs pa dang zhe na /
translated: With whom?

original: de'i phyir dge slong rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dge slong rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore he says, “with fully ordained monks.”

original: 'dir gzhung ni ltung ba bstan pa la gsum bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin la gcig bsnyan par ma rdzogs pa yin na ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni ltung ba bstan pa la gsum bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin la gcig bsnyan par ma rdzogs pa yin na ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here the text says, “There is no offense if two are fully ordained monks and one is not fully ordained.”

original: ci thams cad du lhan cig pa 'di tsam la yang yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci thams cad du lhan cig pa 'di tsam la yang yin nam zhe na /
translated: Is this the only case where there is no offense in eating with another?

original: de'i phyir dge slong rnam pa ji lta bus gos med pa'i zas gnyis pa rnyed pa byed pa po nyid yin pa bzhin no zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dge slong rnam pa ji lta bus gos med pa'i zas gnyis pa rnyed pa byed pa po nyid yin pa bzhin no zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore he says, “Just as with the fully ordained monks who obtain the second meal when there is no food.”

original: dge slong rnam pa ji lta bu gos med pa'i zas gnyis yang yang za ba'i byed pa po nyid yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: dge slong rnam pa ji lta bu gos med pa'i zas gnyis yang yang za ba'i byed pa po nyid yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as a monk who is not sick and who has not done work or is not on a journey may eat two meals by invitation,

original: 'dir yang mi na ba dang las ma byas pa dang lam du ma zhugs pa dang / grur ma zhugs pa de la yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dir yang mi na ba dang las ma byas pa dang lam du ma zhugs pa dang / grur ma zhugs pa de la yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: so too, here, one who is not sick, who has not done work, who is not on a journey, and who has not boarded a boat is the referent of the phrase “or who has boarded a boat.”🔽One who has gone a distance of one krosa or half a krosa, or who will return,

original: lam dpag tshad dam dpag tshad phyed du song ba'am slar 'ong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di la kha cig 'gro ba dang slar 'ong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gzhung byed pa yin te /🔽gzhan dag ni dpag tshad du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am dpag tshad du 'gro ba'am /
analyzed: lam dpag tshad dam dpag tshad phyed du song ba'am slar 'ong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di la kha cig 'gro ba dang slar 'ong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i gzhung byed pa yin te / gzhan dag ni dpag tshad du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am dpag tshad du 'gro ba'am /
translated: some interpret this passage to mean that one who has gone and will return.🔽Others interpret it to mean that one who has gone a distance of one krosa, or who will go a distance of one krosa,

original: dpag tshad phyed du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am slar 'ongs pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: dpag tshad phyed du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am slar 'ongs pa zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: or who has gone or will go a distance of half a krosa, or who will return.

original: 'di gnyis ka @214b yang bden pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di gnyis ka @214b yang bden pa ma yin te /
translated: Both interpretations are incorrect.

original: btsun pa re zhig dge slong gi dpag chad phyed las 'das par bgyis nas 'dus pa dang lhan cig 'tshal na ltung ba cir 'gyur nye ba 'khor ltung ba med do zhes zhu ba las gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: btsun pa re zhig dge slong gi dpag chad phyed las 'das par bgyis nas 'dus pa dang lhan cig 'tshal na ltung ba cir 'gyur nye ba 'khor ltung ba med do zhes zhu ba las gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Upagupta said, “There is no downfall.”

original: ci zan lhan cig ma yin pa nyid thams cad la'am zhe na /
analyzed: ci zan lhan cig ma yin pa nyid thams cad la'am zhe na /
translated: Is it the case that all meals that are not eaten together are like this?

original: de'i phyir dus ston chen po las gzhan pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dus ston chen po las gzhan pa la'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, “Except for great festivals.”

original: 'dir dus ston chen po zhes bya ba'i gzhung ni zan spangs pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir dus ston chen po zhes bya ba'i gzhung ni zan spangs pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here, the text “great festival” refers to the meal that is called “abandoning food.”🔽If one asks, “In which practice is this called ‘the agent’?” the answer is, “If one eats this.”

original: kun du spyod pa gang la 'di la byed pa po nyid ces bya ba 'di la zos na'o zhes 'og nas 'byung na ci dus la ma bab pa'i bza' bar bya ba thams cad la zos na zhes bya ba 'di la brjod par bya ste ;
analyzed: kun du spyod pa gang la 'di la byed pa po nyid ces bya ba 'di la zos na'o zhes 'og nas 'byung na ci dus la ma bab pa'i bza' bar bya ba thams cad la zos na zhes bya ba 'di la brjod par bya ste ;
translated: If one asks, “Should it be said that all food that is not eaten at the proper time is like this?”

original: de'i phyir rtags 'di med pa'i rab tu byung ba'i zas las gzhan pa'i 'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rtags 'di med pa'i rab tu byung ba'i zas las gzhan pa'i 'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, “Except for the food of a renunciate who does not have this sign.”

original: rab tu byung ba gang la rtags 'di med pa zhes bya ba ni phyi rol pa'i rab tu byung ba'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba gang la rtags 'di med pa zhes bya ba ni phyi rol pa'i rab tu byung ba'o //
translated: “One who is not a renunciate” means one who is not a Buddhist renunciate.

original: de'i zas las gzhan pa zhes bya ba ni bza' bar bya ba gang yin pa de zos pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i zas las gzhan pa zhes bya ba ni bza' bar bya ba gang yin pa de zos pa la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: “Other than his food” means that which is to be eaten.

original: der 'ong bar bya ba nyid du gnas pa mtshams kyi nang na 'khod pa dag gi 'ong pa nyid ma dris par za na 'da' ba'i phyed yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: der 'ong bar bya ba nyid du gnas pa mtshams kyi nang na 'khod pa dag gi 'ong pa nyid ma dris par za na 'da' ba'i phyed yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: If one eats without asking about the coming of those who are staying within the boundary, it is a half-day session.

original: gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par gnas pa ste /
analyzed: gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par gnas pa ste /
translated: “Staying” means dwelling.

original: gnas gang la rtsa ba'i gnas yongs su rtsi ba la sogs pa la kha cig ni za bar byed pa de /
analyzed: gnas gang la rtsa ba'i gnas yongs su rtsi ba la sogs pa la kha cig ni za bar byed pa de /
translated: In whatever dwelling, some are eating in the main dwelling, etc.

original: der kha zas kyi don du 'ongs pa nyid gang rnams la gnas gzhan du rtsa ba'i gnas yongs su brtsi ba la sogs pa la mtshams tha mi dad par gnas pa rnams la de rnams ni de gnas pa dang der 'ongs pa nyid rnams so //
analyzed: der kha zas kyi don du 'ongs pa nyid gang rnams la gnas gzhan du rtsa ba'i gnas yongs su brtsi ba la sogs pa la mtshams tha mi dad par gnas pa rnams la de rnams ni de gnas pa dang der 'ongs pa nyid rnams so //
translated: Those who come for the purpose of food, those who are dwelling in other dwellings, in the main dwelling, etc., without a different boundary, they are the ones staying there and coming there.

original: de rnams la 'ongs pa nyid ma dris par za na 'da' ba'i phyed yin te nyes byas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de rnams la 'ongs pa nyid ma dris par za na 'da' ba'i phyed yin te nyes byas so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: If one eats without asking about the arrival of those who are not resident there, it is a half-violation, a minor offense.

original: gnas pa la ma yin par der 'ong ba nyid ma dris par za na ltung byed kho na ste /
analyzed: gnas pa la ma yin par der 'ong ba nyid ma dris par za na ltung byed kho na ste /
translated: If one eats without asking about the arrival of those who are resident there, it is a downfall.

original: de bas na ma byas pa nyid kyi dmigs kyis bsal par de rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na ma byas pa nyid kyi dmigs kyis bsal par de rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should understand that the exception is for those who have not eaten.

original: 'dir gzhung ni gzhi'i 'dug gnas kyi nye 'khor na khang khyim dag yod pa gzhi'i 'dug gnas su dge slong dag zan zan de dag gi khang khyim gyi 'dug gnas nas dge slong dag 'ongs sam zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni gzhi'i 'dug gnas kyi nye 'khor na khang khyim dag yod pa gzhi'i 'dug gnas su dge slong dag zan zan de dag gi khang khyim gyi 'dug gnas nas dge slong dag 'ongs sam zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: Here is the text: If there are houses in the vicinity of the monastery, the monks eat in the monastery. If the monks come from the houses in the vicinity of the monastery, one should ask, “Did the monks come from the houses?”

original: ma dris par za na gzhi'i 'dug gnas pa dag la ni nyes byas su 'gyur la /
analyzed: ma dris par za na gzhi'i 'dug gnas pa dag la ni nyes byas su 'gyur la /
translated: If one eats without asking, it is a minor offense for those who are resident in the monastery.

original: khang khyim gyi 'dug gnas pa dag la ni ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khang khyim gyi 'dug gnas pa dag la ni ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: It is a downfall for those who are resident in the houses.

original: dge slong dag khang khyim gyi 'dug gnas su zan za na /🔽de dag gis gzhi'i 'dug gnas @215a * //
analyzed: dge slong dag khang khyim gyi 'dug gnas su zan za na /🔽de dag gis gzhi'i 'dug gnas @215a * //
translated: If the monks eat in the houses,🔽they should ask, “Did the monks come from the monastery?”

original: nas dge 'dun dag 'ongs sam zhes dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: nas dge 'dun dag 'ongs sam zhes dri bar bya'o //
translated: and ask, “Have the monks come?”

original: ma dris par zos na khang khyim gyi 'dug gnas pa dag la ni nyes byas su 'gyur la /
analyzed: ma dris par zos na khang khyim gyi 'dug gnas pa dag la ni nyes byas su 'gyur la /
translated: If one eats without asking, then for those who live in a house, it is a minor offense;

original: gzhi'i 'dug gnas pa dag la ni ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhi'i 'dug gnas pa dag la ni ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: for those who live in a basic dwelling, it is a downfall.

original: dogs par gyur pa ma dpyad par zhes bya ba'i don 'di la 'dir mtshon pa dang ma dris par rnam par gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: dogs par gyur pa ma dpyad par zhes bya ba'i don 'di la 'dir mtshon pa dang ma dris par rnam par gnas pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of “without examining the danger” is indicated here by “without asking.”

original: dogs par bya ba ma bzung ba nyid kyi phyir dri bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dogs par bya ba ma bzung ba nyid kyi phyir dri bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Because one does not understand the danger, one should not eat without asking.

original: de bas na nges pa rnams la ni nyi ma gcig gi don la yang dge 'dun gyi skabs na smad pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na nges pa rnams la ni nyi ma gcig gi don la yang dge 'dun gyi skabs na smad pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, for those who are certain, it is a downfall even for the sake of a single day, if it is in the presence of the community.

original: gzhan du ni kha na ma tho ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du ni kha na ma tho ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be a complete offense.

original: de bas na de la 'di ni byed pa po yin no //
analyzed: de bas na de la 'di ni byed pa po yin no //
translated: Therefore, this is the agent.

original: de ltar na gnas pa gcig yin la /
analyzed: de ltar na gnas pa gcig yin la /
translated: Thus, there is one rule.

original: de nyid na dge slong gang dag so so na zan za zhing de dag gis kyang 'dus shing za bar mngon sum du shes sam dogs pa dag yod na dge 'dun gyi lhag ma thams cad la khongs su gtogs pa'i nyes byas bskyed pa zhes bya bar rig🔽par bya'o // gang yang rung ba cung zad cig brims na yang zan gcig pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni zan bza' bar bya ba gang yang rung ba cung zad cig dge 'dun gyis logs shig na za ba'am /
analyzed: de nyid na dge slong gang dag so so na zan za zhing de dag gis kyang 'dus shing za bar mngon sum du shes sam dogs pa dag yod na dge 'dun gyi lhag ma thams cad la khongs su gtogs pa'i nyes byas bskyed pa zhes bya bar rig par bya'o // gang yang rung ba cung zad cig brims na yang zan gcig pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni zan bza' bar bya ba gang yang rung ba cung zad cig dge 'dun gyis logs shig na za ba'am /
translated: If there are monks who eat separately, and if it is known or suspected that they have gathered and eaten, then it should be understood that they have committed an offense that is a downfall that requires confession alone.🔽If even a little of any food is distributed, it is still eating in the same place.

original: zan logs shig na za ba bas dge 'dun la brims kyang rung ste ltung ba med ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zan logs shig na za ba bas dge 'dun la brims kyang rung ste ltung ba med ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that if even a little of any food that is to be eaten is eaten separately from the Saṅgha, or if the food is eaten separately from the Saṅgha, then there is no offense if it is distributed to the Saṅgha.

original: 'gro bar chas pa dang glo bur du 'ongs pa dang nad pa dang nad g-yog dang dge skos las gzhan pa thams cad kyis ma zos par g-yos mal dang spyi bungs las mnos te bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni sman gyi gzhi dang phran tshegs dag
analyzed: 'gro bar chas pa dang glo bur du 'ongs pa dang nad pa dang nad g-yog dang dge skos las gzhan pa thams cad kyis ma zos par g-yos mal dang spyi bungs las mnos te bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni sman gyi gzhi dang phran tshegs dag
translated: One should not eat medicine that has not been taken by all the others, except for the sick, the nurse, and the monastery official, when one is about to depart, when one has suddenly arrived, when one is sick, when one is a nurse, or when one has taken it from the community store.

original: las kyang mgron du bos pa na thams cad kyis ma zos pa bza' bar mi bya ba nyid de /
analyzed: las kyang mgron du bos pa na thams cad kyis ma zos pa bza' bar mi bya ba nyid de /
translated: Also, in the Ksudraka Collection, it is said that when one is invited, one should not eat anything that has not been taken by all.

original: de bas na der yang cho ga 'di rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na der yang cho ga 'di rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the procedure should be understood in that case as well.

original: 'dir ni dge 'dun gyi don du zhes bya ba gsungs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni dge 'dun gyi don du zhes bya ba gsungs pa ma yin te /
translated: Here, it is not said that it is for the benefit of the community,

original: gnyis gang la yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis gang la yang ma yin no //
translated: but for the benefit of two or three.

original: gsum bos pa la yang gcig pa nyid de bos pa la ni kha zas gya nom pa la rigs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: gsum bos pa la yang gcig pa nyid de bos pa la ni kha zas gya nom pa la rigs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: When one is invited, it is proper to eat the finest food.

original: de bas na 'dir cho ga 'di med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir cho ga 'di med pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the procedure is not absent in this case.

original: gtsug lag khang na dge slong gcig pu zhig gnas pa na yang des kyang bkad sa las gzhan du zan bza' bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: gtsug lag khang na dge slong gcig pu zhig gnas pa na yang des kyang bkad sa las gzhan du zan bza' bar mi bya ste /
translated: If a single monk is staying in a temple, he should not eat his meal in a place other than the refectory.

original: zos na 'das par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zos na 'das par 'gyur ro //
translated: If he eats there, he commits an offense.

original: des na bslab pa'i gzhi 'di'o //🔽gcig pu zhig mgron du bos par 'gyur ba des kyang sbyin bdag gis bskos pa'i dbang ba ma gtogs par gang zhig ma zos par zan de ni @215b 'di las 'da' bar rjes su byed pa zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //🔽ma zos pa nyid la zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dge slong ma la sogs pa gcig tu 'dus nas kha zas mi mthun pa 'di 'jug pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang don du rjes su gnang ste /
analyzed: des na bslab pa'i gzhi 'di'o // gcig pu zhig mgron du bos par 'gyur ba des kyang sbyin bdag gis bskos pa'i dbang ba ma gtogs par gang zhig ma zos par zan de ni @215b 'di las 'da' bar rjes su byed pa zhes bya bar rig par bya'o // ma zos pa nyid la zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dge slong ma la sogs pa gcig tu 'dus nas kha zas mi mthun pa 'di 'jug pa de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang don du rjes su gnang ste /
translated: Therefore, this is a training rule.🔽If a single monk is invited to a meal, he should not eat that meal in a place other than the one designated by the patron, except if he is sick. This is called “the training rule on not eating apart from the community.”🔽“Not eating apart” means that if a single person, a fellow brahmacārin, a bhikṣuṇī, and so on, gather together and eat different foods, the Blessed One also allows this for the sake of the purpose.

original: dge slong 'ga' 'ong yang srid pas de'i ched du gral gyi dang por stan gcig gzhag ste /
analyzed: dge slong 'ga' 'ong yang srid pas de'i ched du gral gyi dang por stan gcig gzhag ste /
translated: “If a single monk is invited to a meal, he should not eat that meal in a place other than the one designated by the patron, except if he is sick.”

original: kha zas kyi mdun du dge slong ma rnams bkod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: kha zas kyi mdun du dge slong ma rnams bkod par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The monks should be placed in front of the food.

original: de bas na mtshan mthun pa'i tshangs par spyod pa dang mtshungs pa la don 'di mi 'phangs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na mtshan mthun pa'i tshangs par spyod pa dang mtshungs pa la don 'di mi 'phangs par shes par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it should be understood that this rule does not apply to those who are celibate and have the same gender.

original: 'dus shing za ba'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: 'dus shing za ba'i ltung byed do /
translated: The downfall is accrued by the monk who eats in a group.

original: // / rang gi phyed yol nas skya rengs 'char ba'i bar dus ma yin no zhes bya ba la /🔽rang gi zhes bya ba ni phyed yol ba dang skya rengs shar gyis kyang 'di la 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: // / rang gi phyed yol nas skya rengs 'char ba'i bar dus ma yin no zhes bya ba la / rang gi zhes bya ba ni phyed yol ba dang skya rengs shar gyis kyang 'di la 'brel pa'o //
translated: The time is not right from the end of the afternoon until dawn.🔽The term “own” in the phrase “own afternoon” is related to the terms “own dawn” and “own time.”

original: rang gi phyed yol ba'i mthar thug pa la rang gi skya rengs 'byung ba la yang bar du zhes bya ba ni phyed yol man chad nas skya rengs 'char ba'i bar gang yin ba de ni 'dir mngon par 'dod par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi phyed yol ba'i mthar thug pa la rang gi skya rengs 'byung ba la yang bar du zhes bya ba ni phyed yol man chad nas skya rengs 'char ba'i bar gang yin ba de ni 'dir mngon par 'dod par rig par bya'o //
translated: The phrase “own afternoon” refers to the time from the end of the afternoon until the end of the night, which is the time of “own dawn.” The phrase “own time” refers to the time from the end of the afternoon until dawn.

original: 'dir gzhung ni 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa gnas gang na so sor gnas pa de la rang gi zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa gnas gang na so sor gnas pa de la rang gi zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the treatise is called “one’s own” because it is located in a specific place, such as the Rose Apple Land.

original: dge slong gis dus ma lags par bca' bar bgyi ba dang bza' bar bgyi ba 'tshal ba ltung bar mi 'gyur ba mchis sam /
analyzed: dge slong gis dus ma lags par bca' bar bgyi ba dang bza' bar bgyi ba 'tshal ba ltung bar mi 'gyur ba mchis sam /
translated: “Can there be a case where it is not a downfall for a fully ordained monk to eat food that is not at the proper time?”

original: yod de 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i dus kyis gling gsum pa dag tu zos na ltung bar mi 'gyur ba'o zhes ya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: yod de 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i dus kyis gling gsum pa dag tu zos na ltung bar mi 'gyur ba'o zhes ya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: “Yes, if he eats food from the three continents in accordance with the time of the Rose Apple Land.”

original: de nyid la shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni dus ma yin pa de nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po yin no //
analyzed: de nyid la shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni dus ma yin pa de nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po yin no //
translated: “The main factor is the perception” means that the main factor is the perception of the time.

original: ci kun du spyod na zhe na de'i phyir bca' bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba zos na'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: ci kun du spyod na zhe na de'i phyir bca' bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba zos na'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: “What is the practice?” “If he eats food that is not at the proper time.”

original: dus ma yin par za ba'i ltung byed do /
analyzed: dus ma yin par za ba'i ltung byed do /
translated: This is the downfall of eating at the improper time.

original: // / gsog 'jog gi ngo bo bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: // / gsog 'jog gi ngo bo bstan par bya ste /
translated: The essence of storing

original: de'i phyir snga dro'i zas byin len byas pa phyi dro'i zas su dang de thun tshod las 'das pa lta bu ni sog 'jog byas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni phyi dro'i zas su dang snga dro'i zas byin len byas pa phyi dro zos pa la sogs
analyzed: de'i phyir snga dro'i zas byin len byas pa phyi dro'i zas su dang de thun tshod las 'das pa lta bu ni sog 'jog byas pa yin no zhes bya ba ni phyi dro'i zas su dang snga dro'i zas byin len byas pa phyi dro zos pa la sogs
translated: If one receives the evening meal and eats it in the morning, it is stored.

original: pa sog 'jog dang byin len byas pa phyi dro'i zas su dang / de thun tshod las 'das pa lta bu ni sog 'jog byas pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: pa sog 'jog dang byin len byas pa phyi dro'i zas su dang / de thun tshod las 'das pa lta bu ni sog 'jog byas pa nyid yin no //
translated: If one receives it and it becomes the evening meal, or if it is past the proper time, it is stored.

original: de nyid la shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni sog 'jog byas pa de nyid la'o //🔽shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni bca' bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba yang zhes bya ba @216a * //
analyzed: de nyid la shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni sog 'jog byas pa de nyid la'o // shes gtso bo zhes bya ba ni bca' bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba yang zhes bya ba @216a * //
translated: The term “principal” in the phrase “principal knowledge” refers to the act of storing.

original: dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: dang sbyar ro //
translated: The term “principal” in the phrase “principal knowledge” is connected with the phrase “that which is prepared and that which is eaten.”🔽One should not hold it in one’s hand without a reason.

original: lag nyar blangs pa med par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'di ni gleng gzhi dag las yin te /
analyzed: lag nyar blangs pa med par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'di ni gleng gzhi dag las yin te /
translated: This is stated in the sources.

original: bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: One should not eat it.

original: mtshams kyi nang du btsos pa dang zhag lon pa yang mi bya'o zhes bya ba la 'dir gzhung ni sman gyi gzhi las 'di dang po ste /
analyzed: mtshams kyi nang du btsos pa dang zhag lon pa yang mi bya'o zhes bya ba la 'dir gzhung ni sman gyi gzhi las 'di dang po ste /
translated: The text states: The first is this.

original: gnyis pa ni ldang ba nyed kyi phyir zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyis pa ni ldang ba nyed kyi phyir zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The second is because one has arisen.

original: mtshams kyi nang du zhes bya ba ni mtshams kyi nang rol du'o //
analyzed: mtshams kyi nang du zhes bya ba ni mtshams kyi nang rol du'o //
translated: Within the boundaries means within the interior of the boundaries.

original: 'dir gzhung ni nang du btsos pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni nang du btsos pa gang zhe na /
translated: The text states: What is cooking within?

original: gang zhig kun dga' ra ba'i nang du blo mthun par ma bskos shing rung ba ma yin pa'i sa gzhir btsos pa gang yin pa de'o //
analyzed: gang zhig kun dga' ra ba'i nang du blo mthun par ma bskos shing rung ba ma yin pa'i sa gzhir btsos pa gang yin pa de'o //
translated: It is cooking on an unsuitable site that has not been designated by the saṅgha within the monastery.

original: btsos pa dang bzhag pa zhes bya ba ji tsam yin zhe na /
analyzed: btsos pa dang bzhag pa zhes bya ba ji tsam yin zhe na /
translated: What is cooking and storing?

original: gang zhig kun dga' ra ba'i nang du blo mthun par ma bskos shing rung ba ma yin pa'i sa gzhir btsos pa dang zhag lon pa gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig kun dga' ra ba'i nang du blo mthun par ma bskos shing rung ba ma yin pa'i sa gzhir btsos pa dang zhag lon pa gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa yin te /
translated: It is cooking on an unsuitable site that has not been designated by the saṅgha within the monastery and storing it overnight.

original: dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs pas bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ma mo las 'dir kun dga' ra ba'i nang du don gyis tshogs bstan pa mtshams kyi nang du zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs pas bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba ma mo las 'dir kun dga' ra ba'i nang du don gyis tshogs bstan pa mtshams kyi nang du zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here, in the Mūlasarvâstivāda Vinaya, the phrase “within the monastery” is stated by implication.

original: gnas kyi gzhi las kyang 'dir kun dga' ra ba'i sgra ni grags pa ste /
analyzed: gnas kyi gzhi las kyang 'dir kun dga' ra ba'i sgra ni grags pa ste /
translated: In the Kṣudraka-vastu, the word “monastery” is well-known.

original: des na dge slong gis kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du song nas bshags par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na dge slong gis kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du song nas bshags par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is said that a monk should go outside the monastery and confess.

original: kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du bca' bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba blangs te /
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du bca' bar bya ba dang bza' bar bya ba blangs te /
translated: Taking food to be eaten and food to be chewed, he should eat it outside the monastery.

original: kun dga' ra ba'i nang du bza' bar bya'o //
analyzed: kun dga' ra ba'i nang du bza' bar bya'o //
translated: He should eat it inside the monastery.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i nang du steng gi sgra dang sgra chen po gsan par gyur nas de bas na dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ba gnas kyi gzhi la 'di gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' ra ba'i nang du steng gi sgra dang sgra chen po gsan par gyur nas de bas na dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ba gnas kyi gzhi la 'di gsungs pa'o //
translated: The Blessed One heard a loud noise from above in the monastery. Therefore, this is stated in the Kṣudraka-vastu as “the Saṅgha’s monastery.”

original: gsog 'jog byed pa yongs su bsal ba 'di ni lan te /
analyzed: gsog 'jog byed pa yongs su bsal ba 'di ni lan te /
translated: This is the answer to the question of storing.

original: gang zhig 'di mtshams kyi nang du btsos pa dang zhag lon ba nyid ni dor ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig 'di mtshams kyi nang du btsos pa dang zhag lon ba nyid ni dor ba'o //
translated: What is cooked inside this boundary and what has stood overnight is to be discarded.

original: gnas kyi gzhi las kyang gsog 'jog 'byung ba ste gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gnas kyi gzhi las kyang gsog 'jog 'byung ba ste gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: And hoarding occurs from the basis of a dwelling, not elsewhere.

original: dge slong gis bcos pa la yang gsog 'jog byed pa dang gzi brjid med pa'i phyir bor ba nyid do //
analyzed: dge slong gis bcos pa la yang gsog 'jog byed pa dang gzi brjid med pa'i phyir bor ba nyid do //
translated: And because a monk’s cooking is not powerful, what he cooks is discarded.

original: de bas na 'dir yang dge slong gis btsos pa la dge slong nyid kyis bza' bar bya ba nyid dang dge slong mas btsos pa la dge slong ma kho nas za ba nyid do zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir yang dge slong gis btsos pa la dge slong nyid kyis bza' bar bya ba nyid dang dge slong mas btsos pa la dge slong ma kho nas za ba nyid do zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par 'byed pa'o //
translated: Therefore, here also, what is cooked by a monk is to be eaten only by a monk, and what is cooked by a nun is to be eaten only by a nun. This is the analysis.

original: gang zhig sbyin bdag gis rung ba ma yin pa'i gzhir btsos pa'am zhag tu lon pa 'bul bar byed pa de @216b la ni ltung ba'i nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gang zhig sbyin bdag gis rung ba ma yin pa'i gzhir btsos pa'am zhag tu lon pa 'bul bar byed pa de @216b la ni ltung ba'i nyes pa med do //
translated: If a donor offers what has been cooked on an improper basis or what has stood overnight, there is no offense of a downfall.

original: 'bul pa ni rang 'ongs nas brtag par bya zhes bya ba yang nges pa yod de bdag tu bya ba'i don yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yang 'di las rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'bul pa ni rang 'ongs nas brtag par bya zhes bya ba yang nges pa yod de bdag tu bya ba'i don yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yang 'di las rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The statement I will give it to you when I return is also a promise, because it has the meaning of I will do it. This should be understood.

original: dge slong gis grong dag tu dge slong gi don du dgos pa'i gnas la sogs pa gang dag byed cing /
analyzed: dge slong gis grong dag tu dge slong gi don du dgos pa'i gnas la sogs pa gang dag byed cing /
translated: If a monk, for the sake of monks, makes a dwelling place, etc. in villages,

original: de dag gi nang du gang zhig dge slong rnams kyis gnas pa de la dge slong rnams kyis gnas nyid du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi nang du gang zhig dge slong rnams kyis gnas pa de la dge slong rnams kyis gnas nyid du rig par bya'o //
translated: and if monks live in those, they should know that those are dwelling places for monks.

original: der gnas pa btang ba ni dge slong gi gnas kyi gzhi nyid dang bral ba nyid kho na yin no //
analyzed: der gnas pa btang ba ni dge slong gi gnas kyi gzhi nyid dang bral ba nyid kho na yin no //
translated: Abandoning the dwelling there is just the separation from the basis of the monk's dwelling.

original: 'di la nges par byas pa de ni gnas nyid dang bral ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'di la nges par byas pa de ni gnas nyid dang bral ba kho na yin no //
translated: Here, that which is determined is just the separation from the dwelling.

original: de bas na 'dir gnas par mi bya zhes bya ba nges par byas pa gang zhig mi 'jug par gnas gzhan gyi dbang gis gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa la de dang bral ba nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir gnas par mi bya zhes bya ba nges par byas pa gang zhig mi 'jug par gnas gzhan gyi dbang gis gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa la de dang bral ba nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, having determined that one should not stay there, if one does not enter, but stays in the monastery by the power of another's order, then separation from that [monastery] occurs.

original: gzhi ma yin pa'i sa phyogs la yang lhag par gnas par gyur pa la gnas kyi gzhi nyid do //
analyzed: gzhi ma yin pa'i sa phyogs la yang lhag par gnas par gyur pa la gnas kyi gzhi nyid do //
translated: And on a place that is not a basis, one becomes established in excess, and that is the basis of the monastery.

original: de bas na bde ba'i don du 'da' bar gyur pa rnams la gtsug lag khang stong par gnas pa la gnas nyid las skyes pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bas na bde ba'i don du 'da' bar gyur pa rnams la gtsug lag khang stong par gnas pa la gnas nyid las skyes pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, for the sake of happiness, those who have passed [the time limit] should stay in an empty monastery. That is the basis of the monastery.

original: mtshams gsum po nyid la gnas kyi gzhi de gtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshams gsum po nyid la gnas kyi gzhi de gtogs par bya'o //
translated: That basis of the monastery should be included in the three boundaries.

original: der yang rang bzhin can yin gyi bcos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: der yang rang bzhin can yin gyi bcos pa ma yin no //
translated: And there, it is natural, not artificial.

original: slar 'dir rtsig pa la sogs pa'i mtha' nas brtsams te nang gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: slar 'dir rtsig pa la sogs pa'i mtha' nas brtsams te nang gang yin zhe na /
translated: Here again, starting from the edge of the wall, etc., what is inside?

original: de'i phyir 'dir rjen par btsos pa gang yin pa ni de'o zhes bya ba ni nang du btsos pa dang dge slong gis btsos pa dag las byin len byas nas yang btso bar bya ba nyid yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir rjen par btsos pa gang yin pa ni de'o zhes bya ba ni nang du btsos pa dang dge slong gis btsos pa dag las byin len byas nas yang btso bar bya ba nyid yin no zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, here, “what is raw” means that which is raw inside, and “what is cooked by a monk” means that which is cooked after receiving the gift.

original: mi snyi ba rnams kyi ni sum cha bangs pa nyid kyi mdun rol du de nyid yin no zhes bya ba la de nyid ces bya ba ni rjen pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi snyi ba rnams kyi ni sum cha bangs pa nyid kyi mdun rol du de nyid yin no zhes bya ba la de nyid ces bya ba ni rjen pa nyid do //
translated: “What is not soft” means that which is cooked one-third, and “what is soft” means that which is cooked more than that.

original: de snyi ba rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni 'dir skam po'i lo ma dang sha dag la zhugs par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de snyi ba rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni 'dir skam po'i lo ma dang sha dag la zhugs par rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, “what is soft” should be understood as referring to leaves and meat that are dried.

original: rdzas snyi ba nyid ni phye mar byas pa nyid na yang snyi ba nyid dang bral ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rdzas snyi ba nyid ni phye mar byas pa nyid na yang snyi ba nyid dang bral ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: The softness of a substance does not disappear when it is ground into powder.

original: de bas na 'dir rtsva skor ka la sogs pa rnams la 'dir zhugs par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'dir rtsva skor ka la sogs pa rnams la 'dir zhugs par rig par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, here, “what is soft” should be understood as referring to grass, etc.

original: snyi ba rnams kyi ni kha dog gyur pa'o zhes zhes bya ba ni rdzas snyi ba rnams kyi kha dog gyur pa'i mdun rol du de nyid yin te rjen pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: snyi ba rnams kyi ni kha dog gyur pa'o zhes zhes bya ba ni rdzas snyi ba rnams kyi kha dog gyur pa'i mdun rol du de nyid yin te rjen pa nyid yin no //
translated: For the soft, it is the color change.🔽For the soft substances, it is the color change that is the same as before.🔽For the liquids, it is the boiling twice.

original: khu ba rnams kyi ni lan gnyis khol bar gyur pa nyid kyi'o zhes bya ba ni mdun rol du de nyid ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: khu ba rnams kyi ni lan gnyis khol bar gyur pa nyid kyi'o zhes bya ba ni mdun rol du de nyid ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: For the liquids, it is the boiling twice that is the same as before.

original: mes rung bar byas pa ni ma btsos pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mes rung bar byas pa ni ma btsos pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That which is made suitable by fire is not uncooked.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa @217a * //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa @217a * //
translated: Because it is like this,

original: de bas na mtshams kyi nang du mes rung ba mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bas na mtshams kyi nang du mes rung ba mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: therefore one should not make suitable by fire inside the boundary. This is the meaning.🔽The establishment of sitting, which depends on arising, is not unestablished.

original: 'dug pa'i grub pa nyid skye ba la rag las pa la ni ma lon pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dug pa gang gi grub pa nyid skye ba la rag las pa 'dug pa'i grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dug pa'i grub pa nyid skye ba la rag las pa la ni ma lon pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dug pa gang gi grub pa nyid skye ba la rag las pa 'dug pa'i grub pa nyid do //
translated: The establishment of sitting which depends on arising is the establishment of sitting.

original: der skye ba la gang zhig 'di mi 'brel ba'am skye ba'i rgyun dang 'brel ba'i ji ltar skye ba nyid la skye ba'i rgyun dang bral ba la gang zhig der gnas pa de zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: der skye ba la gang zhig 'di mi 'brel ba'am skye ba'i rgyun dang 'brel ba'i ji ltar skye ba nyid la skye ba'i rgyun dang bral ba la gang zhig der gnas pa de zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: How could one who is born there be one who is not connected with that, or one who is connected with the continuum of birth?  The meaning is: how could one who is born there be one who is not connected with the continuum of birth?

original: de nyid ni 'di ltar gyur pa nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'di ltar gyur pa nyid do //
translated: That very thing is just like that.

original: gang zhig 'dug pa la ma lon pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nang du zhag ma lon pa nyid du mi 'gyur zhes bya ba de la 'di bstan pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig 'dug pa la ma lon pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni nang du zhag ma lon pa nyid du mi 'gyur zhes bya ba de la 'di bstan pa'o //
translated: It is not the case that one who is staying there is not one who has not passed the night.  This is taught in regard to that.

original: skye pa'i rgyun rung ba ma yin pa'i sa nas byung ba la rung ba'i sa nas byung ba gang yin pa der bsgrub pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: skye pa'i rgyun rung ba ma yin pa'i sa nas byung ba la rung ba'i sa nas byung ba gang yin pa der bsgrub pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: That which is produced in a place that is not suitable for the continuum of birth, but is produced in a place that is suitable, that is established.

original: nang du zhag ma lon pa nyid ces bya ba ni sa bon nang du zhag lon pa phyi rol du btab pa las skyes pa gang yin pa de la yang cho ga 'di yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: nang du zhag ma lon pa nyid ces bya ba ni sa bon nang du zhag lon pa phyi rol du btab pa las skyes pa gang yin pa de la yang cho ga 'di yin nam zhe na /
translated: As for not having passed the night, if the seed has passed the night inside and is produced externally, does that also have this procedure?

original: ma yin zhes bstan pa ni de dang 'phel ba nyid dam /
analyzed: ma yin zhes bstan pa ni de dang 'phel ba nyid dam /
translated: It is taught that it is not so:

original: de'i gnas skabs gzhan nyid kyis gang du yid ches pa de la ni cho ga 'di yin no //
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs gzhan nyid kyis gang du yid ches pa de la ni cho ga 'di yin no //
translated: The rite is to be performed in the place where one has confidence in the otherness of the state.

original: skye ba gzhan nyid dang de dang 'phel ba nyid dang de'i gnas skabs gzhan nyid kyi cho ga 'di yin no //
analyzed: skye ba gzhan nyid dang de dang 'phel ba nyid dang de'i gnas skabs gzhan nyid kyi cho ga 'di yin no //
translated: The rite is to be performed in the otherness of birth, in the otherness of increase, and in the otherness of the state.

original: de la ji ltar lung la sogs pa'i nang du bzhag pa zhing la gtor ba la bza' bar mi bya ba ma yin pa ni byed pa po nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du 'di la zhag lon pa'i ba la 'o ma byung ba gang yin pa de
analyzed: de la ji ltar lung la sogs pa'i nang du bzhag pa zhing la gtor ba la bza' bar mi bya ba ma yin pa ni byed pa po nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du 'di la zhag lon pa'i ba la 'o ma byung ba gang yin pa de
translated: Just as in the scriptures, etc., it is stated that one should not eat food scattered on the ground, because it is not the work of a human being, in the same way, the milk of a cow that has passed a day after giving birth

original: yang bza' bar bya ba ma yin pa kho na ste /
analyzed: yang bza' bar bya ba ma yin pa kho na ste /
translated: is not to be drunk.

original: 'o ma de mtshams kyi nang nas byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'o ma de mtshams kyi nang nas byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that milk has arisen from the inside of the womb.🔽The milk that is in a vessel placed on the ground is also not to be drunk,

original: snod phyogs na 'dug pa des kyang sa der btsos pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: snod phyogs na 'dug pa des kyang sa der btsos pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: because it has been cooked on the ground.

original: snod rung ba ma yin pa'i phyogs na 'dug pa ni dper na sar gzhag pa'am rgyud nas so //
analyzed: snod rung ba ma yin pa'i phyogs na 'dug pa ni dper na sar gzhag pa'am rgyud nas so //
translated: The milk that is in a vessel placed in an unsuitable place, for example, on the ground or on a string,🔽is not to be drunk.

original: dper na sol ba rnams la bzhag pa'am rtsva la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la de'i sa gzhi la btsos pa nyid dang ma btsos pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dper na sol ba rnams la bzhag pa'am rtsva la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la de'i sa gzhi la btsos pa nyid dang ma btsos pa nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the ground of that is cooked or not cooked.

original: 'tshod par byed pa po de na 'dug pa nyid kyis ni mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'tshod par byed pa po de na 'dug pa nyid kyis ni mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is not the case that the one who cooks it is there,

original: gang zhig sa de la brten pa nyid kyis sa de'i btsos pa nyid ma yin no ;
analyzed: gang zhig sa de la brten pa nyid kyis sa de'i btsos pa nyid ma yin no ;
translated: for that which is based on that ground is not cooked by that ground.

original: / me ni snod ma yin pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: / me ni snod ma yin pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: Fire is not a non-receptacle.

original: me zhes bya ba ni sol ba rnams la yin gyi 'od 'phro ba rnams la ma yin te /
analyzed: me zhes bya ba ni sol ba rnams la yin gyi 'od 'phro ba rnams la ma yin te /
translated: Fire is in the coals, not in the flames,

original: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang 'dra ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is like space.🔽That which is removed from it or arises from it is not that.

original: de las phyung ba dang byung ba dag ni de nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni me de las sam bong ba la sogs pa su zhig gis @217b phyung ba dang rang gis sam rlung la sogs pa'i dbang gis 'byung ba la de nyid ma yin te
analyzed: de las phyung ba dang byung ba dag ni de nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni me de las sam bong ba la sogs pa su zhig gis @217b phyung ba dang rang gis sam rlung la sogs pa'i dbang gis 'byung ba la de nyid ma yin te
translated: That which is removed from that fire by someone or by itself or which arises from it by the power of the wind, etc., is not that.

original: / gang las phyung ba dang byung ba dag las der gyur pa nyid dam sa de la brten pa nyid do //
analyzed: / gang las phyung ba dang byung ba dag las der gyur pa nyid dam sa de la brten pa nyid do //
translated: The meaning is that it is the very thing that is produced from that or it is based on that stage.

original: nyen kor ni gnas nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nyen kor ni gnas nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: The vicinity is the very place.

original: gnas zhes bya ba ni nges gnas par bya ba yin pas na gnas zhes bya ba brjod do ;
analyzed: gnas zhes bya ba ni nges gnas par bya ba yin pas na gnas zhes bya ba brjod do ;
translated: The meaning of “place” is that it is a definite location, thus it is called a “place.”

original: / steng du rgyu ba gang yin pa gnas kyi de kho na nyid la der mi zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: / steng du rgyu ba gang yin pa gnas kyi de kho na nyid la der mi zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not entered there, in the reality of the place, by whatever moves above.

original: lam ji srid tshun chad 'di'i de nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: lam ji srid tshun chad 'di'i de nyid yin zhe na /
translated: Up to what extent is this the reality of the path?

original: de'i phyir 'dom gang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dom gang ngo zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said to be one fathom.

original: phyi rol gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa'i ngos nas brtsams te de dang 'dra ba nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rtsig pa la sogs pa'i ngos nas brtsams te de dang 'dra ba nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that it is of the same nature as that, beginning from the side of an external wall, etc.

original: steng du nam mkha' la sleb pa man chad do zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi steng gi nam mkha' ni nam mkha' ste /
analyzed: steng du nam mkha' la sleb pa man chad do zhes bya ba ni gnas kyi steng gi nam mkha' ni nam mkha' ste /
translated: Up to the sky above is the sky above the place.

original: rgyu ba dag gis sleb par nus pa de la ni gnas nyid de steng du lag pas sleb pa ni yan lag ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu ba dag gis sleb par nus pa de la ni gnas nyid de steng du lag pas sleb pa ni yan lag ma yin no //
translated: That which is capable of being reached by the moving is the location. The hand is not a part of the head.

original: de bas na mgo pos slebs par gyur pa ni 'dir mthar thug pa nyid de /
analyzed: de bas na mgo pos slebs par gyur pa ni 'dir mthar thug pa nyid de /
translated: Therefore, the head is the limit of the location.

original: de 'dir ma g-yogs pa dang ma bkab pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dir ma g-yogs pa dang ma bkab pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan pa'o //
translated: Here, it is taught from the perspective of what is uncovered and not concealed.

original: bkab pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan pa ni kun nas ma bkab pa ni ma g-yogs pa'o //
analyzed: bkab pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan pa ni kun nas ma bkab pa ni ma g-yogs pa'o //
translated: The teaching from the perspective of what is concealed is that what is not concealed is uncovered.

original: nang yang ngo zhes bya ba ni nang gi nam mkha' gang yin pa de yang gnas nyid yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nang yang ngo zhes bya ba ni nang gi nam mkha' gang yin pa de yang gnas nyid yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And also the inside means that the space inside is also the location. This is the meaning.

original: de 'di tsam du rung ba la rung ba nyid dang mi rung ba la mi rung ba nyid kyis gnas kyi gzhi la zhugs pa zhes bya ba 'di'i byed pa'o //
analyzed: de 'di tsam du rung ba la rung ba nyid dang mi rung ba la mi rung ba nyid kyis gnas kyi gzhi la zhugs pa zhes bya ba 'di'i byed pa'o //
translated: Here, the function is that it is the basis of the location by being suitable and unsuitable for this much.

original: steng gi ya thog gzhan yang de nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: steng gi ya thog gzhan yang de nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The upper surface of the head is also just that.

original: steng gi ya thog kha khyer gzhan yang 'og khang de kho na nyid yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: steng gi ya thog kha khyer gzhan yang 'og khang de kho na nyid yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The upper story is the upper story above, and the lower story is the lower story below.

original: nam mkha'i dkyil ni steng gi ya thog thams cad la mngon sum du 'jug pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: nam mkha'i dkyil ni steng gi ya thog thams cad la mngon sum du 'jug pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: The middle of the sky is the upper story above, because it is directly above all.

original: / de'i sgo 'og ma rnams la ni ma yin zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: / de'i sgo 'og ma rnams la ni ma yin zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the lower doors are not that.🔽The nature of the unconnected is the upper story, and the nature of the connected is the lower story.

original: ma 'brel pa'i ngo bo steng du bsgrub pa dang 'tshed pa la sogs pa'i 'og khang gi gnas zhes bya ba steng 'og tu bsgrub pa dang 'tshed pa la sogs pa'i 'og khang gi gnas zhes bya ba ste de bas na 'di shes pa'o //
analyzed: ma 'brel pa'i ngo bo steng du bsgrub pa dang 'tshed pa la sogs pa'i 'og khang gi gnas zhes bya ba steng 'og tu bsgrub pa dang 'tshed pa la sogs pa'i 'og khang gi gnas zhes bya ba ste de bas na 'di shes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, this is known as the upper and lower stories.

original: de'i phyir rten las rnam par bcad nas phyi ma la rung ba nyid kyis blo mthun par ma grags pa zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir rten las rnam par bcad nas phyi ma la rung ba nyid kyis blo mthun par ma grags pa zhes bya bar rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, having eliminated the basis, it should be understood that the subsequent suitability is known as the concordant cognition.

original: 'dir gzhung ni sil bu dag las /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni sil bu dag las /
translated: Here, the text is from the scattered texts:

original: btsun pa gang 'og khang gi rung ba'i khang pa lags pa de'i yang thog kyang rung ba'i khang pa lags sam /
analyzed: btsun pa gang 'og khang gi rung ba'i khang pa lags pa de'i yang thog kyang rung ba'i khang pa lags sam /
translated: Is the upper story of a suitable building in the lower story a suitable building?

original: nye ba 'khor yang thog kyang yin te /
analyzed: nye ba 'khor yang thog kyang yin te /
translated: Upāli, the upper story is also a suitable building.

original: ngos dag de @218a * //
analyzed: ngos dag de @218a * //
translated: The sides are the same.

original: bzhin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bzhin no zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The text says this.

original: gzhan gnas pa nyid ni gzhan gyi gnas nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnas 'di la yang gnas shes par bya bar brjod do //
analyzed: gzhan gnas pa nyid ni gzhan gyi gnas nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnas 'di la yang gnas shes par bya bar brjod do //
translated: But a place that is not a monastery is not a monastery.

original: gzhan par gyur pa nyid ni gzhan gyi gnas nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan par gyur pa nyid ni gzhan gyi gnas nyid ma yin no //
translated: A place that is not a monastery is not a monastery.

original: dper na khyim pas bzung ba 'am gnas par gyur na 'di ltar dge slong dag de nyid na gnas su zin kyang de dge slong gi gnas nyid ma yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na khyim pas bzung ba 'am gnas par gyur na 'di ltar dge slong dag de nyid na gnas su zin kyang de dge slong gi gnas nyid ma yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, if a householder takes possession of a monastery or if it becomes a place for householders, then even though the monks remain there, it is not a monastery for the monks.

original: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba las /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni zhu ba las /
translated: Here is the text of the question:

original: btsun pa de nyid na dge slong dang bcas shing de nyid na khyim pa dang bcas na der dgung du lags pa dang der bsgral bar 'tshal bar bgyi 'am mi bgyi /
analyzed: btsun pa de nyid na dge slong dang bcas shing de nyid na khyim pa dang bcas na der dgung du lags pa dang der bsgral bar 'tshal bar bgyi 'am mi bgyi /
translated: “Venerable, if monks are present there and householders are present there, should one know that the night has passed and the food has been prepared there or not?”

original: nye ba 'khor bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The Buddha said, “You should eat the food of Upasampada.”

original: gnas stong par byas pa zhig tu gal te dge slong re zhig gnas par gyur na de yang dge slong gnas su rung ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: gnas stong par byas pa zhig tu gal te dge slong re zhig gnas par gyur na de yang dge slong gnas su rung ba nyid yin no //
translated: If a bhikṣu stays for a while in an empty monastery, that is also a suitable place for a bhikṣu.

original: khyim pa'i rdzas ma bton na ni stong par bya ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: khyim pa'i rdzas ma bton na ni stong par bya ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: If the householder’s things have not been removed, it is not an empty place.

original: dge tshul rnams kyi gang zag gi gnas dang / dge tshul 'tshogs sa spyir dbang ba'i gnas de ni dge slong gi gnas nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dge tshul rnams kyi gang zag gi gnas dang / dge tshul 'tshogs sa spyir dbang ba'i gnas de ni dge slong gi gnas nyid ma yin no //
translated: The place for the śrāmaṇeras, and the place for the assembly of śrāmaṇeras, is not a place for the bhikṣus.

original: dge slong gi gnas sam dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gnas na dge tshul tsam gnas su zin kyang de lta mod kyi /
analyzed: dge slong gi gnas sam dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gnas na dge tshul tsam gnas su zin kyang de lta mod kyi /
translated: Even if the śrāmaṇeras are staying in a place for the bhikṣus or in a place for the saṅgha of bhikṣus,

original: dge slong gi gnas nyid yin te /
analyzed: dge slong gi gnas nyid yin te /
translated: it is still a place for the bhikṣus.

original: dge tshul rnams ni dge slong gi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dge tshul rnams ni dge slong gi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the śrāmaṇeras are the retinue of the bhikṣus.

original: lag nyar blangs pa dang nang du btsos pa dang / dge slong gis btsos pa de dag dus kyi phyir dgag par mdzad par 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dag ni ma bsdus pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: lag nyar blangs pa dang nang du btsos pa dang / dge slong gis btsos pa de dag dus kyi phyir dgag par mdzad par 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dag ni ma bsdus pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: Those that are held in the hand, cooked inside, and cooked by a monk are not included in those that are to be kept until the end of the day.

original: de dag dgag pa mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni lag nyar blangs pa la sogs pa de dag bza' bar mi bya'o zhes dgag pa mdzad pa la'o //
analyzed: de dag dgag pa mdzad pa zhes bya ba ni lag nyar blangs pa la sogs pa de dag bza' bar mi bya'o zhes dgag pa mdzad pa la'o //
translated: “Those that are prohibited” means those that are held in the hand and so on are prohibited from being eaten.

original: dus kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni gung tshigs tshun chad kyi snga dro dang de phyin chad thun tshod kyi dus de nyid la gang du lag nyar blangs pa la sogs pa byas na dus de nyid du bza' bar bya ba de nyid yin gyi de phan chad
analyzed: dus kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni gung tshigs tshun chad kyi snga dro dang de phyin chad thun tshod kyi dus de nyid la gang du lag nyar blangs pa la sogs pa byas na dus de nyid du bza' bar bya ba de nyid yin gyi de phan chad
translated: “For the sake of the time” means that if one holds something in the hand and so on before noon, it is to be eaten at that time.

original: du ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: du ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not to be eaten after that time.

original: gzhung kha cig las btsun pa ltung bar bya ba'i sman rang gis blangs na byin len bya ba 'di gsungs te lag nyar blangs pa dang nang du btsos pa dang dge slong gis btsos pa de rnams rnyed par gyur na bza' bar bya'am /
analyzed: gzhung kha cig las btsun pa ltung bar bya ba'i sman rang gis blangs na byin len bya ba 'di gsungs te lag nyar blangs pa dang nang du btsos pa dang dge slong gis btsos pa de rnams rnyed par gyur na bza' bar bya'am /
translated: If he obtains medicine that he has held in his hand, that he has cooked himself, or that a fully ordained monk has cooked, he should eat it.

original: nye ba 'khor bza' bar bya ste dus kyi phyir zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: nye ba 'khor bza' bar bya ste dus kyi phyir zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Upagupta said, “You should eat it, because it is for the sake of time.”🔽Other texts state:

original: gzhung gzhan las kyang sa gzhi rung ba la 'tsho ba'i bar du bcad pa'i sman rnyed na bza' bar mi bya 'am /
analyzed: gzhung gzhan las kyang sa gzhi rung ba la 'tsho ba'i bar du bcad pa'i sman rnyed na bza' bar mi bya 'am /
translated: If you obtain medicine that is suitable for the site of affliction, should you not eat it?

original: bka' @218b stsal ba bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bka' @218b stsal ba bza' bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: The Buddha said, “You should not eat it.”

original: gnyis po 'di dag mnyam par sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
analyzed: gnyis po 'di dag mnyam par sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsungs so //
translated: Combining these two statements, the Buddha said,🔽“If you obtain medicine that is suitable for the site of affliction, you should not eat it if it has been held in your hand, cooked by yourself, or cooked by a fully ordained monk.

original: gzhung snga ma las nang du zhag lon pa'i tshig byas pa de la gzhung phyi ma dang 'gal ba'i phyir nyams pa nyid du shes pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhung snga ma las nang du zhag lon pa'i tshig byas pa de la gzhung phyi ma dang 'gal ba'i phyir nyams pa nyid du shes pa yin te /
translated: If you obtain medicine that has been held in your hand, cooked by yourself, or cooked by a fully ordained monk, you should eat it if it is for the sake of time.”

original: gang gi phyir 'dir nang du zhag lon pa bza' bar bya ba nyid bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dir nang du zhag lon pa bza' bar bya ba nyid bkag pa yin no //
translated: Because here, the eating of what has been kept overnight is prohibited.

original: snga ma la yang dus kyi phyir zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar bas kyang nyams pa nyid du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma la yang dus kyi phyir zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar bas kyang nyams pa nyid du shes par bya'o //
translated: And it should be understood that the former is also defective, since it is connected with “because of the time.”🔽Because it is the time for eating what has been kept overnight,

original: gang gi phyir snga dro nas brtsams te nyi ma yol ba'i mthar thug pa de dang de'i 'og tu dus gzhan thun mtshams kyi mthar thug pa'i dus 'di dag la gang du lag nyar blangs pa la sogs pa 'di byas pa'i dus de nyid du bza' bar bya🔽ba yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi phyir snga dro nas brtsams te nyi ma yol ba'i mthar thug pa de dang de'i 'og tu dus gzhan thun mtshams kyi mthar thug pa'i dus 'di dag la gang du lag nyar blangs pa la sogs pa 'di byas pa'i dus de nyid du bza' bar bya ba yin gyi /
translated: that is, the time for eating what has been kept overnight is the time from sunrise until sunset, and the time after that until the end of the next day.🔽It is not the time before that.

original: de tshun chad du ni ma yin zhes bya ba ni dus kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de tshun chad du ni ma yin zhes bya ba ni dus kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of “because of the time.”

original: nyin mtshan gyi cha tha ma la yang gnas pa nyid ni zhag lon pa nyid ces bya bar brjod do //
analyzed: nyin mtshan gyi cha tha ma la yang gnas pa nyid ni zhag lon pa nyid ces bya bar brjod do //
translated: And it is called “kept overnight” because it is kept until the end of the last part of the day and night.

original: gal te de ltar yin na gzhung phyi ma yongs su spangs pas dus kyi phyir zhes bya ba 'di dang mi ldan pa yongs su spangs nas zhag lon pa nyid spangs tshig lhag ma mdzad do zhes 'dir mnyam par sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: gal te de ltar yin na gzhung phyi ma yongs su spangs pas dus kyi phyir zhes bya ba 'di dang mi ldan pa yongs su spangs nas zhag lon pa nyid spangs tshig lhag ma mdzad do zhes 'dir mnyam par sbyar ba'o //
translated: If that is so, then the latter passage would be redundant, since it would be abandoning the former passage, and it would be abandoning the abandonment of the one who has passed a day without possessing it.

original: 'dir gzhung snga ma bzung ba las nang du btsos pa rnams la de dag dgag pa ma bsdus pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung snga ma bzung ba las nang du btsos pa rnams la de dag dgag pa ma bsdus pa nyid yin no //
